    15                                  ; as below:
    16                                  ;    1) SYSINIT code has been changed from MSDOS 5.0 to MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS
    17                                  ;      (except DOUBLESPACE feature! Retro DOS does not use the DOUBLESPACE.)	
    18                                  ;    2) 'iosys6.s' is same with 'iosys5.s' except sysinit code.
    19                                  ;	(Also, MSDOS 5.0 & MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS are almost same except
    20                                  ;	SYSINIT and 'Starting MS-DOS' msg part of MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS.)

    22                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    23                                  
    24                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Multisection binary file format (BIOSDATA & BIOSCODE sections)
    25                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan (Istanbul)
    26                                  
    27                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    28                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    29                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    30                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    31                                        
    32                                  ;---- Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    33                                  ;     at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    34                                  ;     moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    35                                  ;     Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    36                                  ;     SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    37                                  ;     (MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    38                                  
    39                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    40

    45                                  ;rsvdsecs	dw ?			; base 10

    57                                  ;

   153                                  ;============================================================================
   154                                  ;
   155                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   156                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   157                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   158                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   159                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   160                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   161                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   162                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   163                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the

   262                                  ; INPUT:     none

   264                                  ;   dl = int 13 drive number we booted from
   265                                  ;   ch = media byte
   266                                  ;   bx = first data sector (low) on disk (0-based)
   267                                  ;   ds:si = original rom bios diskette parameter table.
   268                                  ;
   269                                  ; if an extended boot record, then ax will be the first data sector
   270                                  ; high word. save ax and set FirstSectorH according to ax if it is an
   271                                  ; extended boot record.

   273                                  ;   ax = first data sector (high) on disk ;

   275                                  ;
   276                                  ;   bx = first data sector on disk
   277                                  ;
   278                                  ;   MediaByte = input ch
   279                                  ;   BootDrive = input dl
   280                                  ;   FirstSectorL = input bx
   281                                  ;   FirstSectorH = input AX, if an extended boot record.;j.k.
   282                                  ;   TotalSectorsL = maximum sector number in this media ;j.k.
   283                                  ;   TotalSectorsH = high word of the above
   284                                  ;   HiddenSectorsL = hidden secotrs

   290                                  ;   ds = 0

   505                                  ; Relocate
   506                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   507                                  ;
   508                                  ; NOTES:
   509                                  ;
   510                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   511                                  ;
   512                                  ; INPUT:     none
   513                                  ;
   514                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   515                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   516                                  ;
   517                                  ; calls:     none
   518                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   519                                  ;
   520                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   521                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   522                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   523                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   524                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   525                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   526                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   527                                  ;
   528                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   529                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   530                                  ;
   531                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   532                                  ;
   533                                  ; jump to relocated code
   534                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   535                                  
   536                                  		; 14/09/2023

   547                                  					; Return: AX = number of contiguous 1K blocks of memory
   548 000000C8 B106                    		mov	cl, 6
   549 000000CA D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl		; Memory size in paragraphs
   550

   552

   659                                  ; FindClusterSize
   660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   661                                  ;
   662                                  ; INPUT:     bpb information in loaded boot record at 0:7c00h
   663                                  ;
   664                                  ; OUTPUT:
   665                                  ;
   666                                  ;	ds = 0
   667                                  ;	ax = bytes/cluster
   668                                  ;	bx = sectors/cluster
   669                                  ;	si destroyed

   672                                  ;
   673                                  ; get bytes/sector from bpb

   703                                  ;
   704                                  ;   Determine if fat is 12 or 16 bit fat. 12 bit fat if floppy, read mbr
   705                                  ;   to find out what system id byte is.
   706                                  ;
   707                                  ; INPUT:
   708                                  ;
   709                                  ; OUTPUT:
   710                                  ;
   711                                  ;   CS:FatSize = FAT_12_BIT or FAT_16_BIT
   712                                  ;   all other registers destroyed

   714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   715                                  
   716                                  CalcFatSize:
   717                                  		; 14/09/2023

   777                                  ; ReadInFirstCluster
   778                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   779                                  ;
   780                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   781                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   782                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   783                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   784                                  ;
   785                                  ; INPUT:
   786                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   787                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   788                                  ;
   789                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   790                                  ;   ClusterSize
   791                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   792                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   793                                  ;
   794                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   795                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   796                                  ;
   797                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   798                                  ; logic:
   799                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   800                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   801                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   802                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   803                                  ;	read in so far.
   804                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   805                                  
   806                                  ; 09/12/2022
   807                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   808                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   809                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in
   810                                  	
   811                                  ReadInFirstCluster:
   812                                  		; 24/12/2022
   813                                  		;;mov	ax, [BioSStart]
   814                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah]	; IO.SYS First Cluster
   815                                  		;dec	ax		; Root dir buffer at 500h (segment=0)
   816                                  		;			; IO.SYS first cluster ptr at 51Ah
   817                                  		;dec	ax		; AX = word [51Ah] - 2
   818                                  		;;mov	[cs:CurrentCluster], ax ;  Initialize to this cluster
   819                                  		; 24/12/2022

   821                                  		;mov	[CurrentCluster], ax
   822                                  		; 24/12/2022

   824                                  
   825                                  		;mov	ax, IbmLoadSize

   827 00000158 F6F1                    		div	cl ; *#*

   829                                  		;;div	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   830                                  					; AL = total cluster read in
   831                                  					; AH = remaining sectors in last cluster
   832                                  		; 06/10/2023
   833                                  		; If cluster size > 3, al = 0, ah = 3
   834                                  		; If cluster size = 2, al = 1, ah = 1
   835                                  		; If cluster size = 1, al = 3, ah = 0
   836                                  		; If ah = 0, nothing remaining in last cluster
   837

   842                                  
   843                                  		; 10/12/2022

   845                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   846 00000160 743A                    		jz	short SetNextClusterNum	; next cluster
   847                                  ; 06/10/2023
   848                                  %if 0
   849                                  		; 06/10/2023

   851                                  		;push	ax		; AX = total clusters in the loader

   856                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL

   860                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   861                                  		adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   862                                  		;mov	ax, [BiosStart]
   863                                  		mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   864                                  		dec	ax
   865                                  		dec	ax

   869                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax

   872                                  					; the rest of the last loader cluster

   876                                  		;mov	di, BiosOffset

   887                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...

   997                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
   998                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   999                                  ;
  1000                                  ; NOTES:
  1001                                  ;
  1002                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
  1003                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
  1004                                  ;
  1005                                  ; INPUT:
  1006                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
  1007                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
  1008                                  ;
  1009                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1010                                  ;	ES = 70h
  1011                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
  1012                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
  1013                                  ;
  1014                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
  1015                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
  1016                                  ;
  1017                                  ; calls:     none
  1018                                  ;
  1019                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1020                                  ;
  1021                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
  1022                                  ;
  1023                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
  1024                                  ;
  1025                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
  1026                                  ;
  1027                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1028                                  
  1029                                  SaveLoadedBios:
  1030                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1031                                  		;push	ds
  1032                                  		
  1033                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1034                                  		; ds = cs
  1035                                  		; ax = number of loaded clusters
  1036 000001A2 F726[0400]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
  1037                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
  1038                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
  1039                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
  1040                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
  1041                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1042                                  		; ax = [clusterSize] * (loaded cluster count)
  1043                                  SaveLoadedBios2:
  1044                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1045 000001A6 1E                      		push	ds
  1046                                  
  1047                                  		;sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)
  1048                                  		; 07/10/2023

  1050 000001AA 29F0                    		sub	ax, si

  1060

  1064                                  		;mov	[NextBioLocation], di
  1065                                  		;;mov	[cs:NextBioLocation], di
  1066                                  
  1067                                  		; es:di = (the next) buffer address for next read
  1068                                  
  1069 000001B4 1F                      		pop	ds		; Save where location for next read
  1070                                  
  1071                                  ; GetContigClusters
  1072                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1073                                  ;
  1074                                  ; NOTES: go find clusters as long as they are contiguous
  1075                                  ;
  1076                                  ;
  1077                                  ; INPUT:
  1078                                  ;   CS:NextBioLocation
  1079                                  ;   CS:
  1080                                  ;
  1081                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1082                                  ;
  1083                                  ; calls: GetNextFatEntry
  1084                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1085                                  ;
  1086                                  ;Set CS:SectorCount to sectors per cluster
  1087                                  ;
  1088                                  ;Call GetNextFatEntry to get next cluster in file
  1089                                  ;
  1090                                  ;Call check_for_eof
  1091                                  ;
  1092                                  ;if (nc returned)
  1093                                  ;
  1094                                  ;   {call GetNextFatEntry
  1095                                  ;
  1096                                  ;    if (new cluster is contig to old cluster)
  1097                                  ;	{add sectors per cluster to CS:SectorCount
  1098                                  ;
  1099                                  ;	 call check_for_eof
  1100                                  ;
  1101                                  ;	 if (nc returned)
  1102                                  ;
  1103                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1104                                  
  1105                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1106                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1107                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h
  1108                                  
  1109                                  GetContigClusters:
  1110                                  
  1111                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1112                                  %if 0	
  1113                                  		xor	ah, ah
  1114                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1115                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1116                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1117                                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1118                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1119                                  		mov	word [cs:CurrentCluster], ax ; Update the last one found
  1120                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
  1121                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
  1122                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1123                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1124                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1125                                  		dec	ax
  1126                                  		dec	ax
  1127                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1128                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1129                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1130                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1131                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1132                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1133                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1134                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1135                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1136                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1137                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1138                                  		mov	es, ax
  1139                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1140                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1141                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1142                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1143                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1144                                  
  1145                                  %endif
  1146                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1147                                  		; ds = cs
  1148 000001B5 A1[1200]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1149 000001B8 A3[0C00]                		mov	[SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1150                                  		;push	word [SectorCount]
  1151 000001BB 50                      		push	ax
  1152 000001BC E8D400                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1153 000001BF 8F06[0C00]              		pop	word [SectorCount]

  1155

  1157 000001CB 741A                    		je	short GoToBioInit ; 23/12/2022

  1172 000001DE 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx

  1175

  1180                                  
  1181                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1182                                  
  1183                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1184                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1185                                  ;
  1186                                  ; NOTES:
  1187                                  ;
  1188                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1189                                  ;
  1190                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1191                                  ;
  1192                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1193                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1194                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1195                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1196                                  ;
  1197                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1198                                  ;
  1199                                  ;   required by msinit
  1200                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1201                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1202                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1203                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1204                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1205                                  ;
  1206                                  ; calls:     none
  1207                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1208                                  ;
  1209                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1210                                  ;
  1211                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1212                                  
  1213                                  GoToBioInit:	
  1214                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1215                                  		; ds = cs	
  1216                                  		;mov	ch, [cs:MediaByte]
  1217                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1218                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:FirstSectorL]
  1219                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1220                                  
  1221 000001E7 8A2E[2800]              		mov	ch, [MediaByte] ; Restore regs required for msint
  1222 000001EB 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1223 000001EF 8B1E[2200]              		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1224 000001F3 A1[2400]                		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1225                                  
  1226                                  		; 15/09/2023 (retrodos 4.s, retrodos41.s, retrodos42.s)
  1227                                  		; (This is not necessary but BP value will be 7C00h
  1228                                  		; when the RetroDOS boot sector code starts the kernel.
  1229                                  		; Retro DOS 4 Kernel source code contains a comment that
  1230                                  		; 'bp = 7C00h' at the init stage. But RetroDOS kernel
  1231                                  		; doesn't use it later. However, i want to leave BP
  1232                                  		; as equal to SP here.) ---rd4load.s---
  1233                                  		;
  1234                                  		; 15/09/2023 (iosys5.s, iosys51.s, iosys6.s)
  1235                                  		; (The BP value here will not be used by IO.SYS later.
  1236                                  		;  It is not necessary to set.) 
  1237                                  		;
  1238                                  		;mov	bp, sp	; 7C00h ; 15/09/2023
  1239                                  
  1240 000001F6 EA00007000              		jmp	70h:0	; Far jump to IoSysAddr	(DOSBIOS)
  1241                                  
  1242                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1243                                  
  1244                                  ; ReadSectors
  1245                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1246                                  ; notES:
  1247                                  ;
  1248                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1249                                  ;
  1250                                  ;
  1251                                  ; INPUT:
  1252                                  ;
  1253                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1254                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1255                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1256                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1257                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1258                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1259                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1260                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1261                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1262                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1263                                  ;
  1264                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1265                                  ;
  1266                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1267                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1268                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1269                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1270                                  ;
  1271                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1272                                  ;
  1273                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1274                                  ;
  1275                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1276                                  ;
  1277                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1278                                  ;
  1279                                  ; do the read
  1280                                  ;
  1281                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1282                                  ;
  1283                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1284                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1285                                  ;
  1286                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1287                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1288                                  
  1289                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1290                                  ReadSectors:
  1291                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1292                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1293                                  ReadSectors:
  1294 000001FB B90500                  		mov	cx, 5			; 5 retries
  1295                                  
  1296                                  		; Convert a logical sector into track/sector/head. AX has the
  1297                                  		; logical sector number
  1298                                  TryRead:
  1299                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1300                                  		; ds = cs
  1301 000001FE 51                      		push	cx
  1302                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:StartSecL]	; Get starting sector
  1303                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:StartSecH]
  1304                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1305                                  		;mov	ax, [StartSecL]	; *	; Get starting sector
  1306                                  		;mov	dx, [StartSecH]
  1307                                  		;push	ax ; *
  1308                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1309 000001FF A1[0800]                		mov	ax, [StartSecH]
  1310 00000202 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1311                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]
  1312                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1313                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1314 00000204 8B1E[1600]              		mov	bx, [SecPerTrack]
  1315 00000208 F7F3                    		div	bx
  1316                                  
  1317                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1318                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1319                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1320 0000020A 89C5                    		mov	bp, ax ; [TempH]
  1321                                  		;pop	ax ; *
  1322 0000020C A1[0600]                		mov	ax, [StartSecL] ; *
  1323 0000020F F7F3                    		div	bx
  1324                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1325                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]	; [TempH]:ax = track,
  1326                                  						; dx = sector number
  1327                                  
  1328                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:SecPerTrack]	; Get number of sectors we can
  1329                                  						; read in this track
  1330 00000211 29D3                    		sub	bx, dx
  1331                                  		;mov	si, bx
  1332 00000213 8B36[0C00]              		mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1333                                  
  1334 00000217 39DE                    		cmp	si, bx
  1335 00000219 7602                    		jna	short GotLength
  1336                                  		;cmp	[SectorCount], si
  1337                                  		;;cmp	[cs:SectorCount], si	; Is possible sectors in track more
  1338                                  		;jnb	short GotLength		; than what we need to read?
  1339 0000021B 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  1340                                  		;mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1341                                  		;;mov	si, [cs:SectorCount]	; Yes, only read what we need to
  1342                                  ;GotLength:
  1343                                  
  1344                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1345                                  		; IO.SYS < 40KB (segment override is not possible)
  1346                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address 
  1347                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)
  1348                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1349                                  %if 0
  1350                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1351                                  		; dma boundary check for >64KB reads
  1352                                  		; Also, Segment Override risk !
  1353                                  		or	di, di
  1354                                  		jz	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for the 1st read
  1355                                  		;cmp	byte [BootDrive], 80h
  1356                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:BootDrive], 80h
  1357                                  		;jnb	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for hard disks
  1358                                  dma_boundary_chk:
  1359                                  		cmp	si, 1
  1360                                  		jna	short dma_boundary_ok 
  1361                                  				; 1 sector read will not cause a boundary error			
  1362                                  		push	dx
  1363                                  		push	ax
  1364                                  		mov	ax, si
  1365                                  		sub	dx, dx
  1366                                  		mul	word [BytesPerSec]
  1367                                  		mov	bx, es
  1368                                  		mov	cl, 4
  1369                                  		shl	bx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes
  1370                                  		; bx = segment start position (for 64K memory sections)
  1371                                  		add	bx, ax	; byte count to read
  1372                                  		pop	ax
  1373                                  		pop	dx
  1374                                  		add	bx, di	; add current buffer offset to byte count
  1375                                  		jnc	short dma_boundary_ok
  1376                                  		
  1377                                  		; Sector count must be decreased to prevent
  1378                                  		; DMA boundary error or segment override risk!
  1379                                  		dec	si
  1380                                  		jmp	short dma_boundary_chk
  1381                                  dma_boundary_ok:
  1382                                  %endif
  1383                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1384                                  GotLength:
  1385                                  		;inc	dl			; Sector numbers are 1-based
  1386                                  		; 18/12/2022
  1387 0000021D 42                      		inc	dx
  1388 0000021E 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl			; Start sector in BL
  1389                                  		
  1390                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1391                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1392                                  		;mov	dx, [TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1393                                  		;;mov	dx, [cs:TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1394                                  		
  1395 00000220 50                      		push	ax
  1396                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1397                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1398 00000221 89E8                    		mov	ax, bp ; [TempH]
  1399 00000223 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1400                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1401 00000225 F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1402                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; Start cyl in AX, head in dl
  1403                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1404                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1405 00000229 58                      		pop	ax
  1406 0000022A F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1407                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; [TempH]:AX = Cylinder, DX = Head
  1408                                  
  1409                                  			; At this moment, we assume that TempH = 0,
  1410                                  			; ax <= 1024, dx <= 255
  1411                                  
  1412 0000022E 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
  1413                                  		
  1414 00000230 B106                    		mov	cl, 6
  1415 00000232 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl			; Shift cyl high bits up
  1416 00000234 08DC                    		or	ah, bl			; Mix in with sector bits
  1417 00000236 88C5                    		mov	ch, al			; Setup cyl low
  1418 00000238 88E1                    		mov	cl, ah			; Setup cyl/high - sector
  1419 0000023A 89FB                    		mov	bx, di			; Get back OFFSET
  1420                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1421 0000023C 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive]		; Get drive
  1422                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]	; Get drive
  1423 00000240 89F0                    		mov	ax, si			; Get number of sectors to read (al)
  1424 00000242 B402                    		mov	ah, 2			; Read sectors
  1425                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1426                                  		;push	ax
  1427                                  		;push	di
  1428                                  
  1429                                  			; Issue one read request. ES:BX have the transfer address,
  1430                                  			; AL is the number of sectors.	
  1431

  1530 0000026B BE[3403]                		mov	si, NonSystemDiskMsg ; "\r\nNon-System disk or disk error\r\nRe"...
  1531 0000026E E81500                  		call	WriteTTY
  1532                                  
  1533                                  		; Wait for a keypress on the keyboard.
  1534                                  		; Use the bios keyboard interrupt.
  1535                                  
  1536 00000271 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  1537 00000273 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  1538                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  1539                                  
  1540                                  		; We have to restore the address of the original rom disk
  1541                                  		; parameter table to the location at [0:DskAddr]. The address
  1542                                  		; of this original table has been saved previously in
  1543                                  		; 0:OrgDasdPtr and 0:OrgDasdPtr+2. After this table address
  1544                                  		; has been restored we can reboot by invoking the bootstrap
  1545                                  		; loader bios interrupt.

  1553

  1565 00000280 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; restore segment
  1566

  1609                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1610                                  
  1611                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1612                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1613                                  ;
  1614                                  ; NOTES:
  1615                                  ;
  1616                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1617                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1618                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1619                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1620                                  ;
  1621                                  ; INPUT:
  1622                                  ;
  1623                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1624                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1625                                  ;
  1626                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1627                                  ;
  1628                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1629                                  ;
  1630                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1631                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1632                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1633                                  ;
  1634                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1635                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1636                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1637                                  ;     else
  1638                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1639                                  ;
  1640                                  ; else
  1641                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1642                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1643                                  ;     else
  1644                                  ;	{get OFFSET by	- multiply cluster by 3
  1645                                  ;
  1646                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1647                                  ;
  1648                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1649                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1650                                  ;
  1651                                  ;	 else
  1652                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1653                                  ;	}
  1654                                  ;    }
  1655                                  ;
  1656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1657                                  
  1658                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1659                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1660                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1661                                  
  1662                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1663 00000293 06                      		push	es
  1664                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1665                                  		; ds = cs
  1666                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FatSegment]
  1667 00000294 A1[3200]                		mov	ax, [FatSegment]
  1668 00000297 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES-> FAT area segment
  1669                                  		; 09/12/2022
  1670                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], END_OF_FILE
  1671                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1672                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1673                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1674                                  		; ds = cs
  1675 00000299 C606[2900]FF            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1676 0000029E A1[0E00]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1677                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1678 000002A1 29D2                    		sub	dx, dx
  1679                                  		; dx = 0
  1680 000002A3 803E[2700]01            		cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1681                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1682                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1
  1683 000002A8 7539                    		jne	short Got16Bit	; 23/12/2022
  1684                                  Got12Bit:
  1685 000002AA 89C6                    		mov	si, ax
  1686 000002AC D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  1687 000002AE 01C6                    		add	si, ax		; SI = AX * 1.5 = AX + AX/2
  1688                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1689 000002B0 56                      		push	si ; (**)
  1690                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1691                                  		;push	dx
  1692                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1693                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1694                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1695 000002B1 E84700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1696                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1697 000002B4 5E                      		pop	si ; (**)
  1698                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1699                                  		;pop	dx
  1700 000002B5 7512                    		jnz	short ClusterOk
  1701 000002B7 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]
  1702                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1703                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster], al
  1704                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1705 000002BA 50                      		push	ax ; (*)
  1706 000002BB 46                      		inc	si
  1707                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1708                                  		;push	dx
  1709 000002BC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1710 000002BE E83A00                  		call	GetFatSector	; Read next fat sector
  1711                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1712                                  		;pop	dx
  1713                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1714                                  		;mov	al, [es:0]
  1715                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster+1], al
  1716                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TempCluster]
  1717                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1718                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1719 000002C1 58                      		pop	ax ; (*) 
  1720 000002C2 268A260000              		mov	ah, [es:0]
  1721 000002C7 EB03                    		jmp	short EvenOdd
  1722                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1723                                  
  1724                                  ClusterOk:				
  1725 000002C9 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1726                                  EvenOdd:	
  1727                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1728                                  		; ds = cs
  1729 000002CC F606[0E00]01            		test	byte [CurrentCluster], 1
  1730                                  		; 10/12/2022		
  1731                                  		;test	byte [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; 09/12/2022
  1732                                  		;;test	word [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; Was last cluster odd?
  1733 000002D1 7505                    		jnz	short OddResult		; If not zero it was odd
  1734 000002D3 25FF0F                  		and	ax, 0FFFh		; Keep low 12 bits
  1735 000002D6 EB04                    		jmp	short TestEOF
  1736                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1737                                  
  1738                                  OddResult:				
  1739 000002D8 B104                    		mov	cl, 4			; Keep high 12 bits for odd
  1740 000002DA D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl
  1741                                  TestEOF:				
  1742 000002DC 3DF80F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF8h		; Is it last cluster?
  1743 000002DF 7318                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone	; Yep, all done here
  1744 000002E1 EB11                    		jmp	short NotLastCluster
  1745                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1746                                  
  1747                                  Got16Bit:
  1748                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1749                                  		;push	dx
  1750                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1751                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1752                                  		; ax = cluster number
  1753                                  		; dx = 0
  1754                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1755 000002E3 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1			; Multiply cluster by 2
  1756                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1757                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1758 000002E5 11D2                    		adc	dx, dx ; dx = 0
  1759 000002E7 89C6                    		mov	si, ax			; Get the final buffer OFFSET
  1760 000002E9 E80F00                  		call	GetFatSector
  1761                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1762                                  		;pop	dx
  1763 000002EC 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1764 000002EF 83F8F8                  		cmp	ax, 0FFF8h
  1765 000002F2 7305                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone
  1766                                  NotLastCluster:	
  1767                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1768                                  		; ds = cs			
  1769                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], NOT_END_OF_FILE ; ~END_OF_FILE
  1770                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1771 000002F4 C606[2900]00            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1772                                  GotClusterDone:				
  1773 000002F9 07                      		pop	es
  1774                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1775                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1776                                  ;EndRead:
  1777 000002FA C3                      		retn
  1778                                  
  1779                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1780                                  
  1781                                  ; GetFatSector
  1782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1783                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ES:0
  1784                                  ;
  1785                                  ;in). SI = offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find.
  1786                                  ;     ES = fat sector segment
  1787                                  ;     CS:BytesPerSec
  1788                                  ;
  1789                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  1790                                  ;      BX = offset value of the corresponding fat entry in the fat sector.
  1791                                  ;      CX destroyed.
  1792                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e. when 12 bit fat entry
  1793                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  1794                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  1795                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat).
  1796                                  ;
  1797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1798                                  
  1799                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1800                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1801                                  GetFatSector:
  1802                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1803                                  		;push	ax
  1804                                  		;push	si
  1805 000002FB 57                      		push	di
  1806 000002FC 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  1807                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1808                                  		; ds = cs
  1809                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1810                                  		;div	cx			; AX = Sector number, DX = Offset
  1811 000002FE F736[1000]              		div	word [BytesPerSec]
  1812 00000302 3B06[0A00]              		cmp	ax, [LastFatSector]
  1813                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:LastFatSector]	; The same fat sector?
  1814 00000306 7421                    		je	short SplitChk		; Don't need to read it again.
  1815 00000308 A3[0A00]                		mov	[LastFatSector], ax
  1816                                  		;mov	[cs:LastFatSector], ax
  1817 0000030B 52                      		push	dx
  1818                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1819 0000030C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1820                                  		;add	ax, [cs:HiddenSectorsL]
  1821                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:HiddenSectorsH]
  1822                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
  1823                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1824                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1825                                  		; ds = cs
  1826 0000030E 0306[2E00]              		add	ax, [FatStartSecL]
  1827 00000312 1316[3000]              		adc	dx, [FatStartSecH]
  1828 00000316 A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax
  1829 00000319 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx		; Set up for ReadSectors
  1830                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax
  1831                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx	; Set up for ReadSectors
  1832                                  		
  1833 0000031D C706[0C00]0100          		mov	word [SectorCount], 1	; 1 sector
  1834                                  		;mov	word [cs:SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector
  1835 00000323 31FF                    		xor	di, di ; 0
  1836                                  		; es:di = FATSEGMENT:0000h
  1837 00000325 E8D3FE                  		call	ReadSectors
  1838 00000328 5A                      		pop	dx
  1839                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1840                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1841                                  SplitChk:
  1842                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1843 00000329 8B0E[1000]              		mov	cx, [BytesPerSec]
  1844 0000032D 49                      		dec	cx			; CX = SECTOR SIZE - 1
  1845 0000032E 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx			; If last byte of sector, splitted entry.
  1846 00000330 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx			; set bx to dx
  1847 00000332 5F                      		pop	di
  1848                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1849                                  		;pop	si
  1850                                  		;pop	ax
  1851                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1852                                  ;EndWrite:		; 10/12/2022
  1853 00000333 C3                      		retn
  1854                                  
  1855                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1856                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1857                                  
  1858                                  ; 09/12/2022

  1860

  1863                                  		; 18/12/2022
  1864                                  		;db 0	; (word alignment)
  1865                                  NonSystemDiskMsg:
  1866 00000334 0D0A                    		db 0Dh,0Ah		; ...
  1867 00000336 4E6F6E2D5379737465-     		db 'Non-System disk or disk error',0Dh,0Ah
  1867 0000033F 6D206469736B206F72-
  1867 00000348 206469736B20657272-
  1867 00000351 6F720D0A           
  1868 00000355 5265706C6163652061-     		db 'Replace and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah,0
  1868 0000035E 6E6420707265737320-
  1868 00000367 616E79206B65792077-
  1868 00000370 68656E207265616479-
  1868 00000379 0D0A00             
  1869                                  ; 25/12/2022
  1870                                  ;align 16
  1871

  1873                                  
  1874                                  number0div	equ ($-START$)
  1875                                  number0mod	equ (number0div % 16)
  1876                                  
  1877                                  %if (number0mod>0) & (number0mod<16)
  1878 0000037C 00<rep 4h>              		times (16-number0mod) db 0
  1879                                  %endif
  1880                                  
  1881                                  EndOfLoader:
  1882                                  		;dw 01A1h	; 10/12/2022
  1883                                  ; 07/10/2023
  1884                                  ENDOFLDR	equ EndOfLoader-$$

  2075 00000119 [4E03]                  start_bds:	dw bds1			; Start	of linked list of BDS's
  2076 0000011B 7000                    		dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  2077                                  
  2078                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2079                                  ; Some floppy drives do not have changeline support. The result is a
  2080                                  ; large amount of inefficiency in the code. A media-check always returns
  2081                                  ; "I don`t know". This cause DOS to reread the FAT on every access and
  2082                                  ; always discard any cached data.
  2083                                  ;    We get around this inefficiency by implementing a "Logical Door Latch".
  2084                                  ; The following three items are used to do this. The logical door latch is
  2085                                  ; based on the premise that it is not physically possible to change floppy
  2086                                  ; disks in a drive in under two seconds (most people take about 10). The
  2087                                  ; logical door latch is implemented by saving the time of the last successful
  2088                                  ; disk operation (in the value TIM_DRV). When a new request is made the
  2089                                  ; current time is compared to the saved time. If less than two seconds have
  2090                                  ; passed then the value "No Change" is returned. If more than two seconds
  2091                                  ; have passed the value "Don't Know" is returned.
  2092                                  ;    There is one complecation to this algorithm. Some programs change the
  2093                                  ; value of the timer. In this unfortunate case we have an invalid timer.
  2094                                  ; This possibility is detected by counting the number of disk operations
  2095                                  ; which occur without any time passing. If this count exceeds the value of
  2096                                  ; "AccessMax" we assume the counter is invalid and always return "Don't
  2097                                  ; Know". The variable "AccessCount" is used to keep track of the number
  2098                                  ; of disk operation which occur without the time changing.
  2099                                  
  2100 0000011D 00                      accesscount:	db 0			
  2101 0000011E FF                      tim_drv:	db 0FFh			
  2102 0000011F 00                      medbyt:		db 0
  2103                                  wrtverify:	; 15/10/2022			
  2104 00000120 02                      rflag:		db 2			; 2 for	read, 3	for write
  2105 00000121 00                      verify:		db 0			; 1 if verify after write
  2106 00000122 0000                    seccnt:		dw 0			
  2107 00000124 00                      		db 0			; -- pad where hardnum was
  2108 00000125 01                      dsktnum:	db 1			; number of diskette drives			
  2109                                  
  2110                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2111                                  ; Some of the older versions of the IBM rom-bios always assumed a seek would
  2112                                  ; have to be made to read the diskette. Consequently a large head settle
  2113                                  ; time was always used in the I/O operations. To get around this problem
  2114                                  ; we need to continually adjust the head settle time. The following
  2115                                  ; algorithm is used:
  2116                                  ;
  2117                                  ;   Get the current head settle value.
  2118                                  ;   If it is 1, then
  2119                                  ;	set slow = 15
  2120                                  ;   else
  2121                                  ;	set slow = value
  2122                                  ;   ...
  2123                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing then
  2124                                  ;	use slow
  2125                                  ;   else
  2126                                  ;	use fast
  2127                                  ;   ...
  2128                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  2129                                  
  2130 00000126 00                      motorstartup:	db 0			; value from table
  2131 00000127 00                      settlecurrent:	db 0			; value	from table
  2132 00000128 00                      settleslow:	db 0			; slow settle value
  2133 00000129 00                      nextspeed:	db 0			; value	of speed to be used
  2134 0000012A 00                      save_head_sttl:	db 0			; used by read_sector routine
  2135 0000012B 00                      save_eot:	db 0			; saved	eot from the default DPT
  2136 0000012C 09                      eot:		db 9			
  2137 0000012D 00000000                dpt:		dd 0			; pointer to Disk Parameter Table			
  2138 00000131 00                      cursec:		db 0			; current sector
  2139 00000132 00                      curhd:		db 0			; current head
  2140 00000133 0000                    curtrk:		dw 0			; current track
  2141 00000135 0000                    spsav:		dw 0			; save the stack pointer
  2142 00000137 08                      formt_eot:	db 8			; eot used for format
  2143 00000138 00                      hdnum:		db 0			; head number
  2144 00000139 0000                    trknum:		dw 0			; track	being manipulated
  2145 0000013B 50                      gap_patch:	db 50h			; format gap patched into dpt
  2146

  2710                                  ;************************************************************************
  2711                                  ;*									*
  2712                                  ;*	Ensure A20 is enabled before jumping into code in HMA.		*
  2713                                  ;*	This code assumes that if Segment of Device request packet is	*
  2714                                  ;*	DOS DATA segment then the Device request came from DOS & that	*
  2715                                  ;*	A20 is already on.						*
  2716                                  ;*									*
  2717                                  ;************************************************************************
  2718                                  
  2719                                  cdev_entry:	; proc near

  2721 00000724 740D                    		jz	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2722                                  				; optimized for DOS in HMA
  2723 00000726 50                      		push	ax
  2724 00000727 2EA1[0300]              		mov	ax, [cs:DosDataSg]
  2725 0000072B 2E3906[1400]            		cmp	[cs:ptrsav+2], ax
  2726 00000730 58                      		pop	ax
  2727 00000731 7505                    		jnz	short not_from_dos
  2728                                  				; jump is coded this way to fall thru
  2729                                  				; in 99.99% of the cases
  2730                                  ce_enter_codeseg:
  2731 00000733 2EFF2E[BD06]            		jmp	far [cs:cdev]

  2739                                  ;************************************************************************
  2740                                  ;*									*
  2741                                  ;*	outchr - this is our int 29h handler. it writes the		*
  2742                                  ;*	   character in al on the display using int 10h ttywrite	*
  2743                                  ;*									*

  2745

  2758                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  2759                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)

  2774                                  block13:

  2778 0000075A 7503                    		jnz	short skipa20

  2780                                  
  2781                                  skipa20:				
  2782 0000075F 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds	; save caller's ds for call-through
  2783 00000764 9C                      		pushf			; fake interrupt
  2784 00000765 2EFF1E[C506]            		call	far [cs:i13x]
  2785                                  		;call	dword ptr cs:i13x
  2786                                  					; call through Bios_Code entry table
  2787 0000076A 2E8E1E[1C00]            		mov	ds, [cs:i13_ds]
  2788 0000076F CA0200                  		retf	2
  2789                                  
  2790                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  2791                                  
  2792                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2793                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2794                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2795                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2796                                  
  2797                                  call_orig13:	; proc far

  2799 00000776 9C                      		pushf			; simulate an int13
  2800 00000777 2EFF1E[B400]            		call	far [cs:Orig13]
  2801                                  		;call	cs:Orig13

  2803 00000781 0E                      		push	cs
  2804 00000782 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2805

  2807                                  		; 10/12/2022

  2813                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:0725h

  2874 000007A5 57                      		push	di
  2875                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2876                                  		;lds	si, [cs:HiMem]
  2877                                  		;les	di, [cs:LoMem]
  2878                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:0740h

  2880 000007A8 8EC7                    		mov	es, di

  2940                                  		;stosw
  2941                                  		;lodsw
  2942                                  		;stosw			; install the saved vector

  2944 000007CF 97                      		xchg	ax, di

  2952                                  					; stkinit in sysinit1 will initialize int19oldxx values
  2953                                  		;mov	cx, 14		; num_i19
  2954                                  		; 07/08/2023
  2955 000007DD B10E                    		mov	cl, 14

  2961                                  		;mov	bx, ax		; save it
  2962                                  		;lodsw

  2967 000007E4 AD                      		lodsw

  2969 000007E5 43                      		inc	bx ; 07/08/2023
  2970 000007E6 7409                    		jz	short i19_restor_1 ; opt no need to check selector too

  2972                                  		;jz	short i19_restor_1

  3000                                  ;

  3002                                  ;		If it recognizes ctrl-alt-del and if DOS was
  3003                                  ;		is running high, it Erases the VDISK header

  3027                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)

  3029                                  		;mov	ax, 40h		; ROMDATASEG

  3032                                  		;; 16/10/2022

  3135                                  
  3136                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  3137                                  
  3138                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  3139                                  ;
  3140                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  3141                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  3142                                  
  3143 0000083B 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  3144                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  3145 0000083D 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  3146 00000841 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  3147 00000845 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  3148 00000849 [4D08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  3149 0000084B 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  3150                                  
  3151                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  3152                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  3153                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  3154                                  
  3155 0000084D 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  3156 00000851 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  3157 00000853 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  3158 00000857 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  3159 00000859 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  3160 0000085B 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  3161 0000085D 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  3162                                  
  3163                                  NextStack:
  3164                                  
  3165                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  3166                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  3167                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  3168                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  3169                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  3170                                  
  3171 0000085F 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  3172 00000863 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  3173 00000865 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  3174 00000869 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  3175 0000086B 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table
  3176                                  
  3177                                  					;SR;
  3178 0000086F 00                      IsWin386:	db 0			; Flag to indicate whether
  3179                                  					; Win386 is running or not
  3180                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3181                                  
  3182                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  3183                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  3184                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  3185                                  
  3186                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  3187 00000870 57                      		push	di
  3188 00000871 06                      		push	es
  3189 00000872 53                      		push	bx
  3190 00000873 50                      		push	ax
  3191 00000874 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  3192 00000876 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  3193 00000878 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  3194 0000087B B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  3195 0000087E CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  3196                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3197                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  3198 00000880 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3199 00000882 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  3200 00000884 740A                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  3201                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  3202 00000886 0E                      		push	cs
  3203                                  		;;mov	ax,offset Skip
  3204                                  		;mov	ax,Skip
  3205                                  		;push	ax
  3206                                  		; 08/10/2023
  3207 00000887 68[9008]                		push	Skip
  3208 0000088A 06                      		push	es
  3209 0000088B 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  3210 0000088C B80100                  		mov	ax,1		; SetFocus function number
  3211 0000088F CB                      		retf			; do the call
  3212                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3213                                  
  3214                                  Skip:					
  3215 00000890 58                      		pop	ax
  3216 00000891 5B                      		pop	bx
  3217 00000892 07                      		pop	es
  3218 00000893 5F                      		pop	di
  3219 00000894 CB                      		retf
  3220                                  
  3221                                  ;End WIN386 support
  3222                                  
  3223                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3224
