  3493 0000127B 00                      		db 0
  3494                                  
  3495                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3496                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3497                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3498                                  
  3499                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3500                                  
  3501                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3502                                  ;
  3503                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3504                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3505                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3506                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3507                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3508                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3509                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3510                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3511                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3512                                  ;
  3513                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3514                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3515                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3516                                  ;
  3517                                  ;	uses:	
  3518                                  ;
  3519                                  ;
  3520                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3521                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3522                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3523                                  ;
  3524                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3525                                  
  3526                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3527                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3528                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3529                                  
  3530                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3531                                  
  3532                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3533                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3534                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3535                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3536                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3537                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3538                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3539                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3540                                  
  3541                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3542                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3543                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3544                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3545                                  
  3546                                  ; 30/12/2022
  3547                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:12DEh)
  3548                                  
  3549                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3550 0000127C 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3551 0000127F 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3552 00001281 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3553 00001284 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3554 00001286 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3555 00001289 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3556                                  atd1:
  3557 0000128B 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3558                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3559                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3560                                  
  3561                                  atd2:					
  3562 00001290 53                      		push	bx
  3563 00001291 51                      		push	cx
  3564 00001292 52                      		push	dx
  3565 00001293 57                      		push	di
  3566 00001294 1E                      		push	ds
  3567 00001295 06                      		push	es
  3568 00001296 50                      		push	ax
  3569 00001297 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3570                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3571 0000129A 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3572                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3573 0000129C C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3574                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3575                                  					; initially no error code.
  3576 000012A1 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3577 000012A4 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3578                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3579 000012A8 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3580                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3581 000012AA C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3582 000012AF EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3583                                  					; return
  3584                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3585                                  
  3586                                  atd3:					
  3587 000012B1 53                      		push	bx
  3588 000012B2 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3589 000012B4 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3590 000012B7 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3591 000012B9 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3592 000012BB 5B                      		pop	bx
  3593 000012BC 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3594 000012BF 0E                      		push	cs
  3595 000012C0 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3596 000012C3 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3597 000012C5 58                      		pop	ax
  3598 000012C6 50                      		push	ax
  3599 000012C7 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3600 000012CA BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3601 000012CD EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3602 000012CE E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3603                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3604                                  
  3605                                  atd4:	
  3606                                  
  3607                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3608                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3609                                  				
  3610 000012D1 58                      		pop	ax
  3611                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3612 000012D2 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3613 000012D6 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3614 000012D8 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3615 000012DA F9                      		stc
  3616                                  atd5:					
  3617 000012DB 07                      		pop	es
  3618 000012DC 1F                      		pop	ds
  3619 000012DD 5F                      		pop	di
  3620 000012DE 5A                      		pop	dx
  3621 000012DF 59                      		pop	cx
  3622 000012E0 5B                      		pop	bx
  3623 000012E1 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3624                                  
  3625                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3626                                  
  3627                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3628                                  ;
  3629                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3630                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3631                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3632                                  ;	
  3633                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3634                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3635                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3636                                  ;
  3637                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3638                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3639                                  ;
  3640                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3641                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3642                                  
  3643                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3644                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3645                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3646 000012E4 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3647                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3648 000012E7 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3649 000012EC 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3650 000012EF 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3651 000012F1 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3652                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3653                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3654                                  setc1:					
  3655 000012F6 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3656 000012F8 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3657                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3658                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3659 000012FA A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3660 000012FD 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3661 00001301 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3662 00001303 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3663                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3664 00001306 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3665 00001309 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3666 0000130B C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3667 0000130E 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3668 00001311 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3669 00001313 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3670                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3671 00001315 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3672 00001318 06                      		push	es
  3673 00001319 53                      		push	bx
  3674 0000131A 0E                      		push	cs
  3675 0000131B E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3676 0000131E 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3677                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3678 00001322 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3679                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3680 00001325 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3681                                  					; only use low part
  3682 00001328 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3683                                  					; control byte modifier
  3684 0000132C 5B                      		pop	bx
  3685 0000132D 07                      		pop	es
  3686                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3687 0000132E 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3688 00001332 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3689 00001335 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3690                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3691 00001337 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3692 0000133B C3                      		retn
  3693                                  
  3694                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3695                                  
  3696                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3697                                  ;
  3698                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3699                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3700                                  ;
  3701                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3702                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3703                                  ;
  3704                                  ;	
  3705                                  ;
  3706                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3707                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3708                                  ;
  3709                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3710                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3711                                  
  3712                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3713 0000133C 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3714 0000133E 0E                      		push	cs
  3715 0000133F E84000                  		call	command
  3716 00001342 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3717                                  doc1:					
  3718 00001344 0E                      		push	cs
  3719 00001345 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3720 00001348 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3721 0000134A B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3722 0000134D BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3723 00001350 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3724 00001351 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3725                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3726                                  
  3727                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3728                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3729                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3730                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3731                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3732                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3733                                  ;
  3734                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3735                                  
  3736                                  rsct_loop:				
  3737 00001352 6D                      		insw
  3738 00001353 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3739 00001355 FB                      		sti
  3740                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3741 00001356 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3742                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3743                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3744 0000135B 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3745 0000135D 0E                      		push	cs
  3746 0000135E E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3747 00001361 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3748 00001363 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3749 00001366 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3750 00001369 FA                      		cli
  3751 0000136A F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3752 0000136C FB                      		sti
  3753                                  doc2:					
  3754 0000136D 0E                      		push	cs
  3755 0000136E E82900                  		call	check_status
  3756 00001371 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3757                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3758 00001373 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3759 00001377 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3760                                  doc3:					
  3761 00001379 C3                      		retn
  3762                                  
  3763                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3764                                  
  3765                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3766                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3767                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3768                                  
  3769                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3770                                  
  3771                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3772                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3773                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3774                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3775                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3776                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3777                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3778                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3779                                  
  3780                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3781                                  ;
  3782                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3783                                  ;
  3784                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3785                                  ;
  3786                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3787                                  ;
  3788                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3789                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3790                                  ;	
  3791                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3792                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3793                                  
  3794                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3795                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3796                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3797                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3798 0000137A 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3799 0000137D EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3800                                  
  3801                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3802                                  
  3803                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3804                                  ;
  3805                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3806                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3807                                  ;
  3808                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3809                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3810                                  ;
  3811                                  ;
  3812                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3813                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3814                                  ;
  3815                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3816                                  
  3817                                  command:	; proc near		
  3818                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3819                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3820                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3821 00001382 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3822 00001385 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3823                                  
  3824                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3825                                  
  3826                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3827                                  ;
  3828                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3829                                  ;
  3830                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3831                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3832                                  ;
  3833                                  ;
  3834                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3835                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3836                                  ;		
  3837                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3838                                  
  3839                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3840                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3841                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3842                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3843 0000138A 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3844 0000138D EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3845                                  
  3846                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3847                                  
  3848                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3849                                  ;
  3850                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3851                                  ;
  3852                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3853                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3854                                  ;
  3855                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3856                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3857                                  
  3858                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3859                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3860                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3861                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3862 00001392 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3863 00001395 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3864                                  
  3865                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3866                                  
  3867                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3868                                  ;
  3869                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3870                                  ;
  3871                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3872                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3873                                  ;
  3874                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3875                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3876                                  
  3877                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3878                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3879                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3880                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3881 0000139A 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3882 0000139D EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3883                                  
  3884                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3885                                  
  3886                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3887                                  ;
  3888                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3889                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3890                                  ;
  3891                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3892                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3893                                  ;
  3894                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3895                                  
  3896                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3897                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3898                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3899                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3900 000013A2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3901 000013A5 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3902                                  
  3903                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3904                                  
  3905                                  endatrom:
  3906                                  
  3907                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3908                                  
  3909                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3910                                  ;;
  3911                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3912                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3913                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3914                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3915                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3916                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3917                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3918                                  
  3919                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3920 000013AA 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3921                                  					;
  3922                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3923                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3924                                  					;
  3925                                  					; warning!!!
  3926                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3927 000013AD 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3928                                  no_hookit:				
  3929                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3930                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3931 000013AF 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3932                                  
  3933                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3934                                  
  3935                                  mebbe_hookit:
  3936 000013B4 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3937 000013B7 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3938 000013B9 1E                      		push	ds
  3939                                  		
  3940                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3941                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  3942                                  		;push	ax
  3943                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  3944                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  3945                                  		;pop	ax
  3946 000013BA 6A40                    		push	40h
  3947 000013BC 1F                      		pop	ds
  3948                                  
  3949 000013BD 9C                      		pushf
  3950                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3951                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3952 000013BE 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3953 000013C3 1F                      		pop	ds
  3954 000013C4 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3955                                  
  3956                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3957                                  
  3958 000013C7 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3959                                  
  3960                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3961                                  
  3962                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3963                                  %if 0  
  3964                                  
  3965                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3966                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3967                                  
  3968                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3969                                  
  3970                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3971                                  ;
  3972                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3973                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3974                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3975                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3976                                  
  3977                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3978                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3979                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3980                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3981                                  		jnb	short century20
  3982                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3983                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3984                                  		jmp	short years
  3985                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3986                                  		
  3987                                  century20:				
  3988                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3989                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3990                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3991                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3992                                  years:					
  3993                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3994                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3995                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3996                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3997                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3998                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3999                                  		mov	bl, 4
  4000                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  4001                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  4002                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  4003                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  4004                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  4005                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  4006                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  4007                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  4008                                  regularyear:				
  4009                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  4010                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  4011                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  4012                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  4013                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  4014                                  					;
  4015                                  					; should never fall through loop
  4016                                  leapyear:				
  4017                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  4018                                  					; change month table.
  4019                                  yeardone:				
  4020                                  		xor	bx, bx
  4021                                  		xor	dx, dx
  4022                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  4023                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  4024                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  4025                                  		mov	cx, 12
  4026                                  months:					
  4027                                  		inc	bl
  4028                                  
  4029                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  4030                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  4031                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  4032                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  4033                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  4034                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  4035                                  		
  4036                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  4037                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  4038                                  					; dh=0
  4039                                  		jbe	short month_done
  4040                                  		inc	si		; next month
  4041                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  4042                                  		loop	months		;
  4043                                  					; should never fall through loop
  4044                                  month_done:				
  4045                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  4046                                  					; restore month table value
  4047                                  		mov	dl, bl
  4048                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  4049                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  4050                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4051                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  4052                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  4053                                  		xchg	dl, al
  4054                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4055                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  4056                                  		xchg	dh, al
  4057                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4058                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  4059                                  		xchg	cl, al
  4060                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4061                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  4062                                  		mov	ch, al
  4063                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  4064                                  		retf
  4065                                  
  4066                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  4067                                  
  4068                                  %endif
  4069                                  
  4070                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4071                                  
  4072                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4073                                  %if 0  
  4074                                  
  4075                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  4076                                  
  4077                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  4078                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  4079                                  		
  4080                                  		push	cx		
  4081                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  4082                                  		mov	cl, 4
  4083                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  4084                                  		or	al, ah
  4085                                  		pop	cx
  4086                                  		retf
  4087                                  %endif
  4088                                  
  4089                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4090                                  
  4091                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  4092                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  4093                                  
  4094                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  4095                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  4096                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  4097                                  
  4098                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  4099                                  
  4100                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4101                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  4102                                  int_6Ch:
  4103 000013C8 0E                      		push	cs
  4104 000013C9 1F                      		pop	ds
  4105                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  4106 000013CA 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  4107 000013CF 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  4108 000013D1 BB[9007]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  4109 000013D4 FFD3                    		call    bx
  4110                                  int6c:					
  4111                                  		;push	cs
  4112                                  		;pop	ds
  4113 000013D6 8F06[B306]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  4114 000013DA 8F06[B506]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  4115 000013DE 9D                      		popf
  4116 000013DF E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  4117 000013E2 FA                      		cli
  4118 000013E3 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  4119 000013E7 FB                      		sti
  4120 000013E8 E8B900                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  4121 000013EB FA                      		cli
  4122 000013EC B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  4123 000013EE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  4124                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  4125                                  					; Return: time of day set
  4126 000013F0 FB                      		sti
  4127                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  4128                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4129 000013F1 FF2E[B306]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  4130                                  
  4131                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4132                                  
  4133                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  4134                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  4135                                  
  4136                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  4137 000013F5 50                      		push	ax
  4138 000013F6 51                      		push	cx
  4139 000013F7 52                      		push	dx
  4140 000013F8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  4141 000013FA CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  4142                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  4143                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  4144                                  					; midnight
  4145                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4146 000013FC 5A                      		pop	dx
  4147 000013FD 59                      		pop	cx
  4148 000013FE 58                      		pop	ax
  4149 000013FF 50                      		push	ax
  4150 00001400 53                      		push	bx
  4151 00001401 51                      		push	cx
  4152 00001402 52                      		push	dx
  4153                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4154                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4155                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:187Ah
  4156 00001403 C706[BB06]0100          		mov	word [daycnt2], 1
  4157                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4158 00001409 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4159 0000140B CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4160                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4161                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4162                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4163                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4164 0000140D 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4165 0000140F E98300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4166                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4167                                  
  4168                                  read_ok:
  4169 00001412 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4170 00001416 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4171 0000141A 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4172 0000141E 8816[BA06]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4173                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4174                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4175                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 2
  4176 00001422 FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 2
  4177 00001426 E83401                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4178 00001429 726A                    		jb	short r_d_ret	; some value out of range
  4179                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4180                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4181                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 3
  4182 0000142B FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 3
  4183 0000142F E8DB00                  		call	date_verify
  4184 00001432 7261                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4185                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4186                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4187 00001434 C606[BB06]00            		mov	byte [daycnt2], 0
  4188 00001439 E8A100                  		call	in_bin
  4189 0000143C A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4190 0000143F 98                      		cbw
  4191 00001440 803E[B706]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4192 00001445 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4193 00001447 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4194                                  century_19:				
  4195 0000144A 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4196 0000144D B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4197 0000144F F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4198 00001451 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4199 00001453 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4200 00001454 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4201                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4202 00001457 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4203                                  		;mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4204                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4205 00001459 A3[BB06]                		mov	[daycnt2], ax
  4206 0000145C 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4207 0000145E 98                      		cbw
  4208 0000145F 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4209 00001461 740B                    		jz	short leap_year
  4210 00001463 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4211 00001466 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4212                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4213                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4214 00001468 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4215 0000146C EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4216                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4217                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4218                                  
  4219                                  leap_year:
  4220 0000146E 803E[B906]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4221 00001473 7604                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4222                                  leap_adjustment:
  4223                                  		;inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4224                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4225 00001475 FF06[BB06]              		inc	word [daycnt2]
  4226                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4227 00001479 8A0E[BA06]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4228 0000147D 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4229 0000147F 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4230                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4231                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4232 00001480 010E[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], cx
  4233 00001484 8A0E[B906]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4234                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4235                                  		;xor	ch, ch
  4236 00001488 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4237                                  		
  4238                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4239                                  		;shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4240                                  		;;mov	si, month_table
  4241                                  		;add	si, cx
  4242                                  		;; 16/10/2022
  4243                                  		;; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4244                                  		;; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4245                                  		;; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4246                                  		;; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4247                                  		;mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4248                                  		;			; get #	days in	previous months
  4249                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4250                                  
  4251                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4252                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1907h
  4253 00001489 B400                    		mov	ah, 0
  4254 0000148B BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab
  4255                                  r_d_sum_loop:
  4256 0000148E AC                      		lodsb
  4257 0000148F 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4258 00001493 E2F9                    		loop	r_d_sum_loop
  4259                                  r_d_ret:
  4260                                  		;mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  4261                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4262 00001495 8B36[BB06]              		mov	si, [daycnt2]
  4263 00001499 5A                      		pop	dx
  4264 0000149A 59                      		pop	cx
  4265 0000149B 5B                      		pop	bx
  4266 0000149C 58                      		pop	ax
  4267 0000149D C3                      		retn
  4268                                  
  4269                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4270                                  
  4271                                  r_t_retj:				
  4272 0000149E 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4273 000014A0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4274 000014A2 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4275                                  
  4276                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4277                                  
  4278                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4279                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4280                                  
  4281                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4282 000014A4 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4283 000014A6 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4284                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4285                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4286                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4287 000014A8 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4288 000014AA 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4289 000014AE 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4290 000014B2 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4291 000014B6 C606[BA06]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4292 000014BB E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4293 000014BE 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4294 000014C0 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4295 000014C3 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4296 000014C5 E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4297 000014C8 8A2E[B706]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4298 000014CC 8A0E[B806]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4299 000014D0 8A36[B906]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4300 000014D4 8A16[BA06]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4301                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4302                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4303                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4304 000014D8 FF1E[C106]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4305                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4306                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4307                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4308                                  r_t_ret:				
  4309 000014DC C3                      		retn
  4310                                  
  4311                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4312                                  
  4313                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4314                                  
  4315                                  in_bin:		; proc near
  4316 000014DD A0[B706]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4317 000014E0 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4318 000014E3 A2[B706]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4319 000014E6 A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4320 000014E9 E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4321 000014EC A2[B806]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4322 000014EF A0[B906]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4323 000014F2 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4324 000014F5 A2[B906]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4325 000014F8 A0[BA06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4326 000014FB E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4327 000014FE A2[BA06]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4328 00001501 C3                      		retn
  4329                                  
  4330                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4331                                  
  4332                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4333                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4334                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4335                                  
  4336                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  4337 00001502 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4338 00001504 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4339 00001506 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4340 00001508 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4341 0000150A D50A                    		aad
  4342 0000150C C3                      		retn
  4343                                  
  4344                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4345                                  
  4346                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4347                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4348                                  
  4349                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  4350 0000150D 803E[B706]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4351 00001512 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4352 00001514 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4353 00001516 803E[B706]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4354                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4355                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4356 0000151B 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4357 0000151D 803E[B806]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4358                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4359                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4360 00001522 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4361                                  century_20:
  4362 00001524 803E[B806]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4363 00001529 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4364 0000152B 803E[B906]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4365 00001530 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4366 00001532 803E[B906]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4367                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4368 00001537 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4369 00001539 803E[BA06]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4370 0000153E 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4371                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4372                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4373                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4374                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4375                                  		; cf=0
  4376                                  		;clc
  4377                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4378 00001540 803E[BA06]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4379 00001545 C3                      		retn
  4380                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4381                                  
  4382                                  date_error:
  4383 00001546 F9                      		stc
  4384                                  date_err2:
  4385 00001547 C3                      		retn
  4386                                  
  4387                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4388                                  
  4389                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4390                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4391                                  
  4392                                  time_verify:	; proc near
  4393 00001548 803E[B706]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4394 0000154D 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4395 0000154F 803E[B806]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4396 00001554 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4397                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4398                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4399                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4400                                  		;clc
  4401                                  		;retn
  4402                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4403 00001556 803E[B906]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4404                                  time_error:
  4405                                  bv_error:
  4406 0000155B F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4407 0000155C C3                      		retn
  4408                                  
  4409                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4410                                  
  4411                                  ;time_error:				
  4412                                  		;stc
  4413                                  		;retn
  4414                                  
  4415                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4416                                  
  4417                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4418                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4419                                  
  4420                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  4421 0000155D B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4422 00001560 BB[B706]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4423                                  bv_loop:
  4424 00001563 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4425 00001565 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4426 00001567 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4427                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4428 0000156A 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4429 0000156C 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4430 0000156E D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4431 00001570 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4432 00001572 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4433 00001574 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4434 00001576 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4435 00001579 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4436 0000157C 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4437 0000157E 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4438 0000157F 49                      		dec	cx
  4439 00001580 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4440 00001582 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4441 00001583 C3                      		retn
  4442                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4443                                  
  4444                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4445                                  ;bv_error:
  4446                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4447                                  		;retn
  4448                                  
  4449                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4450                                  
  4451                                  endk09:
  4452                                  
  4453                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4454                                  
  4455                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4456                                  ;									:
  4457                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4458                                  ;									:
  4459                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4460                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4461                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4462                                  ;									:
  4463                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4464                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4465                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4466                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4467                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4468                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4469                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4470                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4471                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4472                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4473                                  ;		this program.						:
  4474                                  ;									:
  4475                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4476                                  
  4477                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4478                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4479                                  
  4480                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  4481                                  
  4482                                  ; 22/12/2022
  4483                                  align 2
  4484                                  		;db 90h
  4485                                  
  4486                                  ; 30/12/2022
  4487                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:16D6h)
  4488                                  
  4489 00001584 0000                    drvfat:		dw 0			; drive	and fat	id of dos
  4490 00001586 0000                    bios_l:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (low word)
  4491 00001588 0000                    bios_h:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (high word)
  4492 0000158A 0000                    doscnt:		dw 0			; how many sectors to read
  4493 0000158C 00                      fbigfat:	db 0			; flags	for drive
  4494 0000158D 0000                    fatloc:		dw 0			; seg addr of fat sector
  4495 0000158F 0000                    init_bootseg:	dw 0			; seg addr of buffer for reading boot record
  4496 00001591 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  4497 00001592 0002                    md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4498 00001594 0000                    temp_cluster:	dw 0			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4499 00001596 FFFF                    last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4500                                  
  4501                                  ; the following two bytes are used to save the info returned by int 13, ah = 8
  4502                                  ; call to determine drive parameters.

  4735                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  4736                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  4737                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  4738                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  4739                                  ;
  4740                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  4741                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  4742                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  4743                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  4744                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  4745                                  ;	  and a retf
  4746                                  
  4747                                  ; 16/10/2022
  4748                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  4749                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4750                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  4751                                  
  4752                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  4753                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  4754 0000161D [CA00]                  		dw BC_RETF
  4755                                  
  4756                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4757                                  
  4758                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  4759 0000161F 2EFF36[1D16]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  4760                                  					; set up near return to far return
  4761 00001624 2EFF36[BF06]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  4762 00001629 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  4763 0000162A CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  4764
