  7508                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7509                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7510                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7511                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7512                                  
  7513                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7514                                  ;
  7515                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7516                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7517                                  ;
  7518                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7519                                  ;
  7520                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7521                                  ;   initialize it.
  7522                                  ;
  7523                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7524                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7525                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7526                                  ;
  7527                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7528                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7529                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7530                                  ;
  7531                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7532                                  ;   save coding.
  7533                                  ;
  7534                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7535                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7536                                  ;
  7537                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7538                                  ;
  7539                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7540                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7541                                  ;
  7542                                  ; called modules:
  7543                                  ;		  getboot
  7544                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7545                                  ;
  7546                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7547                                  ;
  7548                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7549                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7550                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7551                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7552                                  ;
  7553                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7554                                  
  7555                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7556                                  domini:	
  7557 00001FB8 8A36[0B16]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7558                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7559 00001FBC 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7560                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7561 00001FBE 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7562 00001FC0 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7563                                  domini_loop:				
  7564 00001FC2 52                      		push	dx
  7565 00001FC3 8816[0A16]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7566 00001FC7 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7567 00001FC9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7568                                  					; DL = drive number
  7569                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7570                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7571                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7572                                  		
  7573                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7574                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7575                                  		;inc	dh
  7576                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7577                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7578 00001FCB 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7579 00001FCD 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7580 00001FCF 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7581 00001FD0 A3[1016]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7582                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7583                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7584                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7585 00001FD3 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7586 00001FD5 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7587 00001FD8 A3[1216]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7588 00001FDB 06                      		push	es
  7589 00001FDC 8A16[0A16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7590 00001FE0 E882FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7591                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7592 00001FE3 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7593 00001FE5 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7594                                  domininext:				
  7595 00001FE8 07                      		pop	es
  7596 00001FE9 5A                      		pop	dx
  7597 00001FEA FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7598 00001FEC FECE                    		dec	dh
  7599 00001FEE 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7600                                  dominiret:				
  7601 00001FF0 C3                      		retn
  7602                                  
  7603                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7604                                  
  7605                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7606                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7607                                  
  7608                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7609                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7610                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7611                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7612                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7613                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7614                                  ;
  7615                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7616                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7617                                  
  7618                                  
  7619                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7620 00001FF1 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7621                                  fmpnext:				
  7622 00001FF5 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7623 00001FF9 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7624 00001FFB 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7625 00001FFE 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7626 00002002 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7627                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7628                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7629                                  fmpnextfound:
  7630 00002004 C3                      		retn
  7631                                  
  7632                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7633                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7634                                  ;fmpret:
  7635                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7636                                  
  7637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7638                                  
  7639                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7640                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7641 00002005 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7642 00002008 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7643 0000200A 8B3E[0E16]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7644 0000200E C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7645                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7646 00002013 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7647                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7648                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7649 00002017 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7650                                  					; ffHardFile
  7651 0000201B C606[8C15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7652 00002020 A1[1016]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7653 00002023 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7654 00002026 A1[1216]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7655 00002029 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7656 0000202C A0[0A16]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7657 0000202F 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7658                                  					; set physical number
  7659 00002032 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7660 00002035 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7661                                  					; set logical number
  7662 00002038 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7663 0000203D 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7664 0000203F 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7665                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7666 00002044 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7667                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7668                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7669 00002046 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7670 00002049 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7671 0000204D 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7672 00002050 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7673 00002052 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7674 00002054 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7675 00002058 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7676                                  					; set hidden trks
  7677 0000205B 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7678 0000205F 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7679 00002063 8A16[0A16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7680 00002067 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7681 0000206A B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7682 0000206D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7683                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7684                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7685                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7686 0000206F 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7687 00002071 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7688                                  
  7689                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7690                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7691 00002074 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7692 0000207A 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7693                                  
  7694                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7695                                  		;push	es
  7696 0000207C E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7697                                  					; bx value saved.
  7698                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7699 0000207F 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7700 00002081 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7701                                  fmpnextchain:
  7702 00002084 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7703                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7704                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7705                                  
  7706                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7707                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7708                                  		;retn
  7709                                  
  7710                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7711                                  
  7712                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7713                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7714                                  
  7715                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7716                                  	
  7717 00002087 57                      		push	di
  7718 00002088 53                      		push	bx
  7719                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7720                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7721                                  		;push	ds
  7722 00002089 06                      		push	es
  7723                                  setmini_1:				
  7724 0000208A 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7725 0000208E 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7726 00002090 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7727 00002094 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7728 00002096 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7729 0000209A 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7730 0000209C 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7731 0000209F 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7732 000020A3 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7733 000020A5 F9                      		stc
  7734 000020A6 07                      		pop	es
  7735                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7736                                  		;pop	ds
  7737 000020A7 5B                      		pop	bx
  7738 000020A8 5F                      		pop	di
  7739 000020A9 C3                      		retn
  7740                                  
  7741                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7742                                  setmini_2:
  7743 000020AA E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7744

  7747                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2

  7749                                  
  7750                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7751                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7752                                  ;
  7753                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7754                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7755                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7756                                  ;
  7757                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7758                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7759                                  ;			trash ax
  7760                                  
  7761                                  dmax_check:
  7762 000020AD 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7763 000020B2 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7764 000020B4 06                      		push	es
  7765                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7766 000020B5 B84304                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7767 000020B8 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7768                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7769 000020BA 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7770                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7771                                  					; set message flag
  7772                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7773 000020C0 07                      		pop	es
  7774                                  
  7775                                  		;;push	es
  7776                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7777                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7778                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7779                                  					; set message flag
  7780                                  		;;pop	es
  7781                                  		;
  7782                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7783                                  dmax_ok:
  7784 000020C1 C3                      		retn
  7785                                  
  7786                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7787                                  
  7788                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7789                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7790                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7791                                  ;								 
  7792                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7793                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7794                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7795                                  
  7796                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7797 000020C2 56                      		push	si
  7798 000020C3 53                      		push	bx
  7799 000020C4 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7800                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7801 000020C8 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7802 000020CB 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7803                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7804 000020CD 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7805 000020CF EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7806                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7807                                  
  7808                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7809                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7810 000020D1 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7811                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7812 000020D3 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7813                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7814 000020D6 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7815                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7816 000020DA 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7817                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7818                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7819 000020DD 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7820 000020E0 8B36[0C16]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7821 000020E4 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7822 000020E6 8306[0C16]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7823 000020EB FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7824 000020EF 8306[0E16]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7825 000020F4 5B                      		pop	bx
  7826 000020F5 5E                      		pop	si
  7827 000020F6 C3                      		retn
  7828                                  
  7829                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7830                                  
  7831                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7832                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7833                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0

  7835                                  
  7836                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7837 000020F7 50                      		push	ax
  7838 000020F8 51                      		push	cx
  7839 000020F9 52                      		push	dx
  7840 000020FA 55                      		push	bp
  7841 000020FB 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7842                                  loop_clock:				
  7843 000020FD 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7844 000020FF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7845 00002101 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7846 00002103 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7847                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7848                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7849                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7850 00002105 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7851 00002108 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7852 0000210A 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7853 0000210D 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7854 0000210F 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7855 00002112 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7856 00002114 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7857 00002115 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7858                                  delay:					
  7859 00002118 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7860 0000211A EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7861                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7862                                  
  7863                                  clock_present:				
  7864 0000211C 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7865 00002122 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7866                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7867                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7868 00002125 56                      		push	si
  7869 00002126 E8CCF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7870 00002129 FA                      		cli
  7871                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7872 0000212A 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7873 0000212E FB                      		sti
  7874 0000212F 5E                      		pop	si
  7875                                  
  7876                                  no_readdate:				
  7877 00002130 5D                      		pop	bp
  7878 00002131 5A                      		pop	dx
  7879 00002132 59                      		pop	cx
  7880 00002133 58                      		pop	ax
  7881 00002134 C3                      		retn
  7882                                  
  7883                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7884                                  
  7885                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7886                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7887                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7888                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7889                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7890                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7891                                  ;
  7892                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7893                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7894                                  ;
  7895                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7896                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7897                                  ;
  7898                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7899                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7900                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7901                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7902                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7903                                  ;
  7904                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7905                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7906                                  
  7907                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7908                                  
  7909                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7910                                  
  7911                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7912                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7913                                  			
  7914 00002135 50                      		push	ax
  7915 00002136 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7916 0000213C 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7917 0000213E 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7918                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7919 00002144 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7920 00002146 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7921                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7922 0000214C 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7923                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7924                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7925                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7926                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7927                                  cmosck4:				
  7928 0000214E B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7929                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7930 00002150 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7931                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7932 00002152 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7933 00002155 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7934                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7935 00002157 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7936 0000215A 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7937                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7938 0000215C 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7939 0000215E B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7940                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7941 00002160 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7942                                  cmosck9:				
  7943 00002163 58                      		pop	ax
  7944 00002164 C3                      		retn
  7945                                  
  7946                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7947                                  
  7948                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7949                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7950                                  ;									       :
  7951                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7952                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7953                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7954                                  ;									       :
  7955                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7956                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7957                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7958                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7959                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7960                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7961                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7962                                  
  7963                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7964 00002165 9C                      		pushf
  7965 00002166 FA                      		cli
  7966 00002167 53                      		push	bx
  7967 00002168 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7968 00002169 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7969 0000216B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7970                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7971 0000216D 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7972 0000216E E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7973 00002170 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7974 00002172 58                      		pop	ax
  7975 00002173 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7976 00002175 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7977 00002177 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7978                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7979 00002179 90                      		nop
  7980 0000217A E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7981 0000217C 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7982 0000217E 5B                      		pop	bx
  7983 0000217F 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7984 00002180 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7985 00002183 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7986                                  
  7987                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7988                                  
  7989                                  cmos_popf:				
  7990 00002184 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7991                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7992                                  
  7993                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7994                                  
  7995                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7996                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7997                                  ;									       :
  7998                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7999                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  8000                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  8001                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  8002                                  ;									       :
  8003                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  8004                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  8005                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  8006                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  8007                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  8008                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  8009                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8010                                  
  8011                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  8012 00002185 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  8013 00002186 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  8014 00002187 FA                      		cli
  8015 00002188 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  8016 00002189 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  8017 0000218B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8018                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8019 0000218D 90                      		nop
  8020 0000218E 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  8021 00002190 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8022 00002192 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  8023 00002193 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  8024 00002195 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  8025 00002197 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8026                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8027 00002199 90                      		nop
  8028 0000219A E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8029 0000219C 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  8030 0000219D 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  8031 0000219E E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  8032 000021A1 C3                      		retn
  8033                                  
  8034                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8035                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8036                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8037                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  8038                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8039                                  
  8040                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8041                                  ;
  8042                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  8043                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  8044                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  8045                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  8046                                  
  8047                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8048                                  
  8049                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  8050                                  ;
  8051                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  8052                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  8053                                  ;  es:di = load location
  8054                                  
  8055                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8056                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8057                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8058                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  8059                                  
  8060                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8061                                  getclus:				
  8062 000021A2 51                      		push	cx
  8063 000021A3 57                      		push	di
  8064 000021A4 2E890E[8A15]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8065 000021A9 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  8066 000021AB 48                      		dec	ax
  8067 000021AC 48                      		dec	ax
  8068 000021AD F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  8069                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  8070                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  8071 000021AF 2E0306[8615]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  8072 000021B4 2E1316[8815]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  8073                                  unpack:					
  8074 000021B9 1E                      		push	ds
  8075 000021BA 50                      		push	ax
  8076 000021BB 53                      		push	bx
  8077 000021BC 2E8B36[8D15]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  8078 000021C1 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  8079 000021C3 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  8080 000021C5 2EF606[8C15]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  8081                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  8082 000021CB 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  8083 000021CD D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  8084                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  8085 000021CF 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  8086                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  8087 000021D1 52                      		push	dx
  8088 000021D2 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8089 000021D4 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8090 000021D7 5A                      		pop	dx
  8091 000021D8 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  8092 000021DA 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  8093                                  		; 25/06/2023
  8094                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  8095 000021DC 2EA2[9415]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  8096 000021E0 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  8097 000021E1 52                      		push	dx
  8098 000021E2 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8099 000021E4 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8100 000021E7 5A                      		pop	dx
  8101                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  8102 000021E8 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  8103 000021EB 2EA2[9515]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  8104 000021EF 2EA1[9415]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  8105                                  even_odd:				
  8106 000021F3 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  8107 000021F4 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  8108 000021F5 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  8109 000021F7 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  8110 000021F9 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  8111                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  8112 000021FB D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8113 000021FD D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8114 000021FF D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8115                                  havclus:				
  8116 00002201 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  8117 00002203 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  8118 00002207 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  8119                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8120                                  
  8121                                  unpack16:				
  8122 00002209 52                      		push	dx
  8123 0000220A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8124 0000220C D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  8125 0000220E 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8126 00002211 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8127 00002214 5A                      		pop	dx
  8128 00002215 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  8129                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  8130                                  unpackx:				
  8131 00002217 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  8132 00002218 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  8133 00002219 1F                      		pop	ds
  8134 0000221A 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  8135 0000221C 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  8136 0000221F 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  8137 00002221 2E010E[8A15]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8138 00002226 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  8139                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8140                                  
  8141                                  getcl2:					
  8142 00002228 53                      		push	bx
  8143 00002229 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  8144 0000222A 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  8145 0000222B 2EA1[8415]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  8146 0000222F 2E8B0E[8A15]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  8147 00002234 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  8148 00002235 2E8F06[2305]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  8149                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  8150 0000223A 1E                      		push	ds
  8151 0000223B 0E                      		push	cs
  8152 0000223C 1F                      		pop	ds
  8153 0000223D 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8154                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8155 0000223E BD[5E09]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8156                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8157                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8158 00002241 E8DBF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  8159 00002244 1F                      		pop	ds
  8160 00002245 5B                      		pop	bx
  8161 00002246 5F                      		pop	di
  8162 00002247 2EA1[8A15]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  8163 0000224B 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  8164 0000224D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  8165 0000224F 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  8166 00002251 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  8167 00002252 C3                      		retn
  8168                                  
  8169                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8170                                  
  8171                                  
  8172                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  8173                                  ;
  8174                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  8175                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  8176                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  8177                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  8178                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  8179                                  ;
  8180                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  8181                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  8182                                  ;      other registera saved.
  8183                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  8184                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  8185                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  8186                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  8187                                  
  8188                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8189                                  get_fat_sector:	
  8190 00002253 50                      		push	ax
  8191 00002254 51                      		push	cx
  8192 00002255 57                      		push	di
  8193 00002256 56                      		push	si
  8194 00002257 06                      		push	es
  8195 00002258 1E                      		push	ds
  8196 00002259 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  8197 0000225B 2E8B0E[9215]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8198 00002260 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  8199 00002262 90                      		nop
  8200                                  
  8201                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  8202                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  8203                                  
  8204 00002263 06                      		push	es
  8205 00002264 1E                      		push	ds
  8206 00002265 57                      		push	di
  8207 00002266 50                      		push	ax
  8208 00002267 0E                      		push	cs
  8209 00002268 1F                      		pop	ds
  8210                                  
  8211 00002269 2EA1[8415]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8212 0000226D BD[6D05]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8213                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8214                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8215 00002270 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8216 00002271 E8ABF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8217 00002274 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8218 00002275 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8219                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8220 00002279 5F                      		pop	di
  8221 0000227A 1F                      		pop	ds
  8222 0000227B 07                      		pop	es
  8223 0000227C 2E3B06[9615]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8224 00002281 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8225 00002283 2EA3[9615]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  8226                                  					; sector number
  8227                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8228 00002287 52                      		push	dx
  8229 00002288 2EC706[2305]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8230                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8231                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8232 0000228F 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8233 00002291 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8234 00002294 2EA1[8415]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8235 00002298 1E                      		push	ds
  8236 00002299 07                      		pop	es
  8237 0000229A 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8238 0000229C 1E                      		push	ds
  8239 0000229D 0E                      		push	cs
  8240 0000229E 1F                      		pop	ds
  8241 0000229F 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8242 000022A0 BD[5E09]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8243                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8244                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8245 000022A3 E879F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8246 000022A6 1F                      		pop	ds
  8247 000022A7 5A                      		pop	dx
  8248 000022A8 2E8B0E[9215]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8249                                  
  8250                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8251 000022AD 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8252 000022AE 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8253                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8254                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8255 000022B0 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8256 000022B2 1F                      		pop	ds
  8257 000022B3 07                      		pop	es
  8258 000022B4 5E                      		pop	si
  8259 000022B5 5F                      		pop	di
  8260 000022B6 59                      		pop	cx
  8261 000022B7 58                      		pop	ax
  8262 000022B8 C3                      		retn
  8263                                  
  8264                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8265                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8266                                  
  8267                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8268                                  
  8269                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8270                                  		;db 0
  8271                                  
  8272                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8273                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8274                                  
  8275                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8276 000022B9 00<rep 7h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8277                                  %endif
  8278                                  
  8279                                  ;align 16
  8280                                  
  8281                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8282                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8283                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8284                                  
  8285                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  8286                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8287                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  8288                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  8289                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  8290                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8291                                  
  8292                                  ;============================================================================
  8293                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8294                                  ;============================================================================
  8295                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8296                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8297                                  
  8298                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8299                                  
  8300                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8301                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8302                                  
  8303                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8304                                   
  8305                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8306                                  
  8307                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8308                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8309                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8310                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8311                                  
  8312                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8313 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8314 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8315                                  
  8316                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8317                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8318                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8319                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8320                                  
  8321                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8322                                  
  8323                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8324                                  
  8325                                  ;************************************************************************
  8326                                  ;*									*
  8327                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8328                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8329                                  ;*									*
  8330                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8331                                  ;*									*
  8332                                  ;************************************************************************
  8333                                  
  8334                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  8335                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8336                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8337                                  
  8338                                  _seg_reinit:
  8339 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8340                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8341                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8342 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8343                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8344                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8345                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8346 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8347                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8348 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8349 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8350 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8351 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8352                                  
  8353                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8354                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8355                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8356                                  		
  8357                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8358 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8359                                  		
  8360 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8361                                  
  8362                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8363                                  
  8364                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8365                                  
  8366                                  ;************************************************************************
  8367                                  ;*									*
  8368                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8369                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8370                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8371                                  ;*									*
  8372                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8373                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8374                                  ;*									*
  8375                                  ;************************************************************************
  8376                                  
  8377                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8378 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8379 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8380 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8381 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8382 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8383 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8384 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8385 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8386 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8387 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8388 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8389                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8390                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8391 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8392                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  8393 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  8394                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8395 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  8396 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8397 00000061 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8398                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8399 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8400 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8401 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8402 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8403 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8404                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8405 00000079 81FE[3805]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8406                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  8407                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8408                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8409 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8410                                  
  8411                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8412                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8413                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8414                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8415                                  ;
  8416                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8417                                  ;
  8418                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8419                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8420                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8421                                  ;
  8422                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8423                                  
  8424                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8425                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8426 0000007F C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8427 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8428 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8429 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8430                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8431                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8432 0000008E 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8433 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8434                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8435                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8436 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8437 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8438 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  8439 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  8440 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8441 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8442 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8443 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8444 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8445 000000AA FC                      		cld
  8446                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8447 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8448                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8449 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8450 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8451                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8452                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  8453                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8454                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8455 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8456                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8457 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8458 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8459                                  					; mark operation complete
  8460 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  8461 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  8462 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8463 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  8464 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  8465 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  8466 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  8467 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  8468 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8469                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8470                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  8471 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  8472 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  8473                                  
  8474                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8475                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8476                                  bc_retf:
  8477 000000CA CB                      		retf
  8478                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8479                                  
  8480                                  command_error:				
  8481 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8482 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8483                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8484                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8485                                  
  8486                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8487                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8488                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8489                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8490                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8491                                  ; high.
  8492                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8493                                  
  8494                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8495                                  
  8496                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  8497                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  8498                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8499                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8500                                  
  8501 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8502                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8503                                  		
  8504                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8505                                  
  8506                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8507                                  
  8508                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8509 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8510                                  					; unknown command error
  8511                                  
  8512                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8513                                  
  8514                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8515                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8516                                  
  8517                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8518                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8519                                  
  8520                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8521                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8522                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8523 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8524 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8525                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8526 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8527 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8528 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8529                                  
  8530                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8531                                  
  8532                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8533
