  8550                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8551                                  ;*									*
  8552                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8553                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8554                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8555                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8556                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8557                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8558                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8559                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8560                                  ;*									*
  8561                                  ;************************************************************************
  8562                                  
  8563                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8564                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  8565                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8566 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  8567                                  
  8568                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8569 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8570                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8571 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8572                                  					; 00 init
  8573 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8574 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8575 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8576                                  					; 03
  8577 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8578                                  					; 04
  8579 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8580                                  					; 05
  8581 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8582 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8583                                  					; 07
  8584 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8585                                  					; 08
  8586 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8587 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8588                                  con_table_end:
  8589 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8590                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8591 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8592 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8593 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8594 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8595 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8596                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8597 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8598                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8599 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8600 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8601 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8602 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8603 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8604 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8605 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8606 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8607 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8608 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8609 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8610 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8611 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8612 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8613 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8614 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8615 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8616 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8617 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8618 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8619                                  prn_table_end:
  8620 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8621                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8622 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8623 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8624 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8625 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8626 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8627 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8628 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8629 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8630 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8631 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8632 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8633                                  aux_table_end:
  8634 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8635                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8636 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8637 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8638 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8639 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8640 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8641 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8642 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8643 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8644 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8645 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8646                                  tim_table_end:
  8647                                  
  8648                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8649                                  
  8650                                  ;************************************************************************
  8651                                  ;*									*
  8652                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8653                                  ;*									*
  8654                                  ;************************************************************************
  8655                                  
  8656                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8657                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8658 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8659                                  con_loop:				
  8660 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8661 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8662 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8663                                  con_exit:				
  8664 00000164 F8                      		clc
  8665 00000165 C3                      		retn
  8666                                  
  8667                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8668                                  
  8669                                  ;************************************************************************
  8670                                  ;*									*
  8671                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8672                                  ;*									*
  8673                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8674                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8675                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8676                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8677                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8678                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8679                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8680                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8681                                  ;*									*
  8682                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8683                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8684                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8685                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8686                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8687                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8688                                  ;*									*
  8689                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8690                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8691                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8692                                  ;*									*
  8693                                  ;************************************************************************
  8694                                  
  8695                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8696                                  chrin:		
  8697 00000166 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8698 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8699 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8700 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8701 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8702 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8703 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8704 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8705 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8706 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8707 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8708 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8709                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8710                                  
  8711                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8712                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8713                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8714                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8715                                  ;      else
  8716                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8717                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8718                                  ;      endif
  8719                                  ;    endif
  8720                                  ;  endif
  8721                                  
  8722                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8723 00000183 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8724 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8725 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8726 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8727 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8728 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8729 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8730 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8731                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8732                                  
  8733                                  not_ext:				
  8734 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8735 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8736                                  alt_save:				
  8737 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8738                                  keyret:					
  8739 0000019E C3                      		retn
  8740                                  
  8741                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8742                                  
  8743                                  ;************************************************************************
  8744                                  ;*									*
  8745                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8746                                  ;*									*
  8747                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8748                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8749                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8750                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8751                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8752                                  ;*									*
  8753                                  ;************************************************************************
  8754                                  
  8755                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8756                                  con_rdnd:				
  8757 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8758 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8759 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8760 000001A6 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8761 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8762 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8763 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8764 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8765 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8766                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8767 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8768                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8769 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8770 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8771 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8772 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8773                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8774                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8775                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8776                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8777 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8778 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8779 000001CA C3                      		retn
  8780                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8781                                  
  8782                                  gotchr:					
  8783 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8784 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8785 000001CF 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8786 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8787 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8788                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8789                                  
  8790                                  notbrk:					
  8791 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8792 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8793 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8794 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8795                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8796                                  
  8797                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8798 000001E0 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8799 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8800 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8801 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8802 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8803 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8804 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8805                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8806                                  rdexit:					
  8807 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8808 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8809                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8810                                  bc_exvec:				
  8811 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8812                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8813 000001FB C3                      		retn
  8814                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8815                                  
  8816                                  ;************************************************************************
  8817                                  ;*									*
  8818                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8819                                  ;*									*
  8820                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8821                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8822                                  ;*									*
  8823                                  ;************************************************************************
  8824                                  
  8825                                  con_writ:
  8826                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8827 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8828                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8829                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8830                                  con_lp:					
  8831 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8832 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  8833 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8834                                  					; AL = character to display
  8835 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8836                                  cc_ret:					
  8837 00000206 F8                      		clc
  8838 00000207 C3                      		retn
  8839                                  
  8840                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8841                                  
  8842                                  ;************************************************************************
  8843                                  ;*									*
  8844                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8845                                  ;*									*
  8846                                  ;************************************************************************
  8847                                  
  8848                                  con_flush:
  8849 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8850                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8851 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8852 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8853                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8854                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8855                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8856 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8857 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8858 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8859                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8860 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8861                                  
  8862                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8863                                  
  8864                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8865                                  
  8866                                  ;************************************************************************
  8867                                  ;*									*
  8868                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8869                                  ;*									*
  8870                                  ;************************************************************************
  8871                                  
  8872                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8873                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8874                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8875                                  
  8876                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8877                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8878                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8879                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8880                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8881                                  ;
  8882                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8883                                  
  8884                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8885                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8886                                  
  8887                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8888                                  
  8889                                  ;************************************************************************
  8890                                  ;*									*
  8891                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8892                                  ;*									*
  8893                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8894                                  ;*									*
  8895                                  ;************************************************************************
  8896                                  
  8897                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8898 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8899                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8900                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8901                                  prn_done:
  8902 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8903 0000021D C3                      		retn
  8904                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8905                                  
  8906                                  ;************************************************************************
  8907                                  ;*									*
  8908                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8909                                  ;*									*
  8910                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8911                                  ;*									*
  8912                                  ;************************************************************************
  8913                                  
  8914                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8915                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8916 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8917                                  prn_loop:				
  8918 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8919                                  prn_out:				
  8920 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8921 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8922 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8923 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8924 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8925 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8926 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8927 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8928 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8929 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8930 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8932                                  
  8933                                  _prnwf:					
  8934 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8935 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8936                                  TestPrnError:				
  8937 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8938 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8939                                  pmessg:					
  8940 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8941                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8942                                  
  8943                                  prn_con:				
  8944 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8945 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8946                                  ;prn_done:				
  8947                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8948                                  prn_done2:
  8949                                  		;clc
  8950                                  		; cf=0
  8951 0000024E C3                      		retn
  8952                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8953                                  
  8954                                  ;************************************************************************
  8955                                  ;*									*
  8956                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8957                                  ;*									*
  8958                                  ;************************************************************************
  8959                                  
  8960                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8961 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8962 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8963 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8964                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8965                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8966 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8967 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8968                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8969                                  
  8970                                  ;************************************************************************
  8971                                  ;*									*
  8972                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8973                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8974                                  ;*									*
  8975                                  ;************************************************************************
  8976                                  
  8977                                  prnstat:				
  8978 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8979                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8980                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8981                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8982                                  
  8983                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8984                                  
  8985                                  ;************************************************************************
  8986                                  ;*									*
  8987                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8988                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8989                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8990                                  ;*									*
  8991                                  ;************************************************************************
  8992                                  
  8993                                  prnop:	
  8994 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8995 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8996                                  
  8997                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8998                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8999                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  9000                                  
  9001 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  9002 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  9003 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  9004 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  9005 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  9006 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  9007 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  9008                                  
  9009                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  9010                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  9011                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  9012                                  
  9013                                  NextTest:				
  9014 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  9015                                  					; i/o error?
  9016 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  9017                                  
  9018                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  9019                                  
  9020 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  9021                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  9022 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  9023 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  9024 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  9025                                  ret1:					
  9026 00000282 C3                      		retn
  9027                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9028                                  
  9029                                  checknotready:				
  9030 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  9031 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  9032 00000288 C3                      		retn
  9033                                  
  9034                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9035                                  
  9036                                  ;************************************************************************
  9037                                  ;*									*
  9038                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  9039                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  9040                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  9041                                  ;*									*
  9042                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  9043                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  9044                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  9045                                  ;*									*
  9046                                  ;************************************************************************
  9047                                  
  9048                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9049                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  9050 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  9051                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  9052 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  9053 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  9054 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9055 0000028F 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9056 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9057                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  9058 00000295 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9059 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  9060                                  prn_getstat:				
  9061 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9062 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  9063 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  9064 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  9065 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  9066 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  9067 000002A7 26                      		es
  9068 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  9069                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  9070                                  					; lodsb
  9071 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9072 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  9073 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  9074 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  9075                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9076                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  9077                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  9078 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  9079                                  
  9080                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9081                                  
  9082                                  prn_bperr:				
  9083 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  9084                                  prn_berr:				
  9085 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9086                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9087                                  
  9088                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9089                                  
  9090                                  ;************************************************************************
  9091                                  ;*									*
  9092                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  9093                                  ;*									*
  9094                                  ;************************************************************************
  9095                                  
  9096                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  9097                                  ; 11/01/2019
  9098                                  
  9099                                  ;********************************;*
  9100                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  9101                                  ;********************************;*
  9102                                  
  9103                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  9104                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  9105                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  9106                                  
  9107                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  9108                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  9109                                  ;;endstruc
  9110                                  
  9111                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  9112                                  
  9113                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9114                                  
  9115                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9116                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  9117 000002B7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  9118 000002BB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  9119                                  					; ioc_pc
  9120 000002C0 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  9121                                  
  9122                                  prnfuncerr:				
  9123 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  9124                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9125                                  
  9126                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  9127 000002C5 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  9128 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  9129 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9130                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  9131 000002CF 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9132 000002D3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9133                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  9134 000002D5 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9135 000002D9 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  9136 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  9137 000002DD 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  9138 000002DF 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  9139 000002E1 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  9140                                  prngetcount:				
  9141                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  9142 000002E4 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  9143 000002E8 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  9144                                  					; return current retry count
  9145                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9146                                  		; cf=0
  9147                                  		;clc
  9148 000002EB C3                      		retn
  9149                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9150                                  
  9151                                  ;************************************************************************
  9152                                  ;*									*
  9153                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  9154                                  ;*									*
  9155                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  9156                                  ;************************************************************************
  9157                                  
  9158                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  9159 000002EC C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  9160 000002F0 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  9161                                  					; ioc_pc
  9162 000002F5 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  9163 000002F7 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  9164 000002FB 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  9165 000002FD 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  9166 000002FF 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  9167 00000301 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  9168                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  9169                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9170                                  		; cf=0		
  9171                                  		;clc
  9172 00000303 C3                      		retn
  9173                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9174                                  
  9175                                  prn_query_err:
  9176                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  9177                                  		;stc
  9178 00000304 E9CEFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  9179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9180                                  
  9181                                  ;************************************************************************
  9182                                  ;*									*
  9183                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9184                                  ;*									*
  9185                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9186                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9187                                  ;*									*
  9188                                  ;************************************************************************
  9189                                  
  9190                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  9191                                  
  9192                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  9193                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9194                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  9195                                  
  9196                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  9197                                  
  9198                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9199                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9200                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9201                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9202                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9203                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9204                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  9205                                  
  9206                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9207                                  
  9208                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9209                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9210                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9211                                  
  9212                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9213                                  
  9214                                  ;************************************************************************
  9215                                  ;*									*
  9216                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9217                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9218                                  ;*									*
  9219                                  ;************************************************************************
  9220                                  
  9221                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9222                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  9223 00000307 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9224 00000309 E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9225 0000030C 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9226 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9227 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9228 00000312 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9229                                  aux1:					
  9230 00000314 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9231                                  					; won't return if error
  9232                                  aux2:					
  9233 00000317 AA                      		stosb
  9234 00000318 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9235                                  exvec2:					
  9236 0000031A F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9237                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9238 0000031B C3                      		retn
  9239                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9240                                  
  9241                                  ;************************************************************************
  9242                                  ;*									*
  9243                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9244                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9245                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9246                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9247                                  ;*									*
  9248                                  ;************************************************************************
  9249                                  
  9250                                  auxin:					
  9251 0000031C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  9252 0000031E E83A00                  		call	auxop
  9253 00000321 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  9254                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9255                                  		;retn
  9256                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9257 00000324 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9258                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9259                                  
  9260                                  arbad:					
  9261 00000326 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9262                                  		;xor	al, al
  9263                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9264                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9265 00000327 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  9266 00000329 E9ABFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9267                                  
  9268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9269                                  
  9270                                  ;************************************************************************
  9271                                  ;*									*
  9272                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9273                                  ;*									*
  9274                                  ;************************************************************************
  9275                                  
  9276                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9277 0000032C E85200                  		call	getbx
  9278 0000032F 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  9279 00000331 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9280 00000333 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9281 00000335 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9282 00000338 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9283 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9284 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9285 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9286 00000341 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9287 00000344 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9288                                  auxdrx:					
  9289 00000346 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9290                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9291                                  
  9292                                  auxbus:					
  9293 00000349 E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9294                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9295                                  
  9296                                  ;************************************************************************
  9297                                  ;*									*
  9298                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  9299                                  ;*									*
  9300                                  ;************************************************************************
  9301                                  
  9302                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  9304 0000034F A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  9305 00000351 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9306 00000353 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9307 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9308                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9309                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9310                                  		;clc
  9311 00000358 C3                      		retn
  9312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9313                                  
  9314                                  ;************************************************************************
  9315                                  ;*									*
  9316                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9317                                  ;*									*
  9318                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9319                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9320                                  ;*									*
  9321                                  ;************************************************************************
  9322                                  
  9323                                  auxstat:				
  9324 00000359 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9325                                  
  9326                                  		; fall into auxop
  9327                                  
  9328                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9329                                  
  9330                                  ;************************************************************************
  9331                                  ;*									*
  9332                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9333                                  ;*									*
  9334                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9335                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9336                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9337                                  ;*									*

  9339                                  
  9340                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9341 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9342                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9343                                  					; get port number
  9344 0000035F CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9345                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9346                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9347 00000361 C3                      		retn
  9348                                  
  9349                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9350                                  
  9351                                  ;************************************************************************
  9352                                  ;*									*
  9353                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9354                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9355                                  ;*									*
  9356                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9357                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9358                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9359                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9360                                  ;*									*
  9361                                  ;************************************************************************
  9362                                  
  9363                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9364 00000362 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9365 00000365 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9366                                  					; zero out buffer
  9367                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9368                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9369                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9370 00000368 C3                      		retn
  9371                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9372                                  
  9373                                  ;************************************************************************
  9374                                  ;*									*
  9375                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9376                                  ;*									*
  9377                                  ;************************************************************************
  9378                                  
  9379                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9380                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9381 00000369 E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9382                                  aux_loop:				
  9383 0000036B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  9384                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  9385 0000036E 47                      		inc	di
  9386 0000036F B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  9387 00000371 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9388 00000374 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9389 00000377 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9390 00000379 B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9391 0000037B E959FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9392                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9393                                  
  9394                                  awok:					
  9395 0000037E E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9396                                  					; still	more character to print
  9397                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9398                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9399                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9400 00000380 C3                      		retn
  9401                                  
  9402                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9403                                  
  9404                                  ;************************************************************************
  9405                                  ;*									*
  9406                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  9407                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  9408                                  ;*									*
  9409                                  ;************************************************************************
  9410                                  
  9411                                  getbx:	
  9412 00000381 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  9413                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  9414                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  9415 00000385 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  9416                                  		; 12/12/2022

  9425                                  ;								:
  9426                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9427                                  ;								:
  9428                                  ;								:
  9429                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9430                                  ;								:
  9431                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9432                                  ;								:
  9433                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9434                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9435                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9436                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9437                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9438                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9439                                  ;								:
  9440                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9441                                  ;								:
  9442                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9443                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9444                                  ;								:
  9445                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9446                                  
  9447                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9448                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9449                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9450                                  
  9451                                  ;19/07/2019
  9452                                  ;09/03/2019
  9453                                  
  9454                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9455                                  
  9456                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9457                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9458                                  
  9459 0000038A B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9460 0000038C F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9461 0000038E B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9462 00000390 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9463 00000392 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9464 00000395 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9465 00000397 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9466 00000399 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9467 0000039B B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9468 0000039D F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9469 0000039F 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9470 000003A1 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9471 000003A4 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9472 000003A6 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9473 000003A8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9474                                  
  9475                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9476                                  
  9477 000003AB 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9478 000003AC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9479 000003AD BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9480 000003B0 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9481 000003B2 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9482 000003B4 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9483 000003B5 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9484 000003B7 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9485 000003B9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9486 000003BC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9487 000003BD BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9488 000003C0 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9489 000003C2 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9490 000003C4 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9491 000003C6 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9492 000003C8 98                      		cbw
  9493 000003C9 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9494 000003CA F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9495 000003CC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9496 000003CE CB                      		retf			; far return

  9504                                  ;
  9505                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9506                                  ;

  9508                                  ;
  9509                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9510                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)

  9651 00000464 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
  9652 00000468 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  9653 0000046A FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  9654                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  9655 0000046E 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
  9656                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  9657                                  regularyear:

  9664                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }

  9669                                  leapyear:

  9672                                  					; change month table.

  9714                                  bintobcd:	; proc near		; real time clock support
  9715                                  
  9716                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  9717                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  9718                                  		
  9719 000004C9 D40A                    		aam			; AH = AL/10, AL = AL MOD 10
  9720 000004CB D510                    		aad     10h             ; db 0D5h,10h
  9721                                  					; AL = (AH*10H)+AL, AH = 0
  9722 000004CD C3                      		retn
