 14931                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14932                                  
 14933                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14934                                  ; install_bds installs a bds at location es:di into the current linked list of
 14935                                  ; bds maintained by this device driver. it places the bds at the end of the
 14936                                  ; list. Trashes (at least) ax, bx, di, si
 14937                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14938                                  
 14939                                  install_bds:
 14940 0000176A 1E                      		push	ds		; save Bios_Data segment
 14941 0000176B BE[1901]                		mov	si, start_bds	; beginning of chain
 14942                                  
 14943                                  		; ds:si now points to link to first bds
 14944                                  		; assume bds list is non-empty
 14945                                  loop_next_bds:
 14946 0000176E C534                    		lds	si, [si]	; [si+BDS.link]
 14947                                  					; fetch	next bds
 14948 00001770 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14949 00001774 384404                  		cmp	[si+4],	al	; does this one	share a	physical
 14950                                  					; drive	with new one?
 14951 00001777 7518                    		jnz	short next_bds
 14952 00001779 B310                    		mov	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 14953 0000177B 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14954                                  					; set both of them to i_am_mult	if so
 14955 0000177F 085C23                  		or	[si+23h], bl	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14956 00001782 26806523DF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0DFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags],~fi_own_physical
 14957                                  					; we don't own it
 14958 00001787 8A5C23                  		mov	bl, [si+23h]	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14959                                  					; determine if changeline available
 14960 0000178A 80E302                  		and	bl, 2		; fchangeline
 14961 0000178D 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14962                                  next_bds:
 14963                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14964 00001791 B8FFFF                  		mov	ax, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14965 00001794 3904                    		cmp	[si], ax	; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14966                                  		;cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14967                                  					; are we at end	of list?
 14968 00001796 75D6                    		jnz	short loop_next_bds
 14969 00001798 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; [si+BDS.link+2],es
 14970                                  					; install bds
 14971 0000179B 893C                    		mov	[si], di
 14972 0000179D 268905                  		mov	[es:di], ax	; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14973                                  		;mov	word [es:di], 0FFFFh ; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14974                                  					; set next pointer to null
 14975 000017A0 1F                      		pop	ds
 14976                                  
 14977                                  ; 01/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:1785h)

 15107                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15108                                  
 15109                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15110                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15111                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15112                                  ;
 15113                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15114                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15115                                  
 15116                                  mediacheck:	
 15117 00001836 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15118 00001839 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15119 0000183B E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15120 0000183E 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15121 00001840 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15122 00001843 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15123 00001845 50                      		push	ax
 15124 00001846 52                      		push	dx
 15125 00001847 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15126                                  					; set logical drive number
 15127 0000184B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15128 0000184D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15129                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15130                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15131 0000184F 5A                      		pop	dx
 15132 00001850 58                      		pop	ax
 15133 00001851 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15134 00001853 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15135                                  
 15136                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15137                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15138                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15139                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15140                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15141                                  ; status.
 15142                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15143 00001856 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15144 0000185A 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15145                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15146                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15147                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15148                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15149 0000185E 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15150                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15151                                  
 15152                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15153                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15154                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15155                                  
 15156 00001860 50                      		push	ax
 15157 00001861 51                      		push	cx
 15158 00001862 52                      		push	dx
 15159 00001863 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15160 00001866 5A                      		pop	dx
 15161 00001867 59                      		pop	cx
 15162 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 15163 00001869 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15164 0000186B 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15165                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15166 0000186D 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15167                                  mediaret:				
 15168 0000186F C3                      		retn
 15169                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15170                                  
 15171                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15172                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15173                                  ; or write.
 15174                                  
 15175                                  mediadovolid:				
 15176 00001870 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15177 00001873 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15178 00001875 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15179 00001878 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15180 0000187A E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15181                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15182                                  
 15183                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15184                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15185                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15186                                  ; dos.
 15187                                  ;
 15188                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15189                                  
 15190                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15191                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15192                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15193                                  
 15194                                  checklatchio:	
 15195                                  
 15196                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15197                                  			
 15198 0000187D E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15199 00001880 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15200                                  
 15201                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15202                                  
 15203 00001882 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15204 00001885 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15205                                  
 15206                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15207                                  ; expensive verification.
 15208                                  
 15209 00001887 E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15210 0000188A 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15211 0000188C E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15212 0000188F 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15213 00001891 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15214 00001893 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15215 00001895 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15216                                  checklatchret:				
 15217 00001898 E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15218                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15219 0000189B F9                      		stc
 15220 0000189C 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15221                                  checkret:				
 15222 0000189D C3                      		retn
 15223                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15224                                  
 15225                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15226                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15227                                  ;
 15228                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15229                                  
 15230                                  checkfatvid:				
 15231 0000189E E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15232 000018A1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15233 000018A3 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15234                                  
 15235                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15236                                  
 15237                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15238                                  
 15239                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15240                                  
 15241                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15242                                  ;
 15243                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15244                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15245                                  ;
 15246                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15247                                  ;
 15248                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15249                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15250                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15251                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15252                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15253                                  ;
 15254                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15255                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15256                                  ; routine.)
 15257                                  ;
 15258                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15259                                  
 15260                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15261                                  check_vid:
 15262                                  
 15263                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15264                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15265                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15266                                  
 15267 000018A5 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15268                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15269                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15270 000018AA 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15271 000018AC E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15272 000018AF 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15273 000018B1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15274 000018B3 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15275                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15276 000018B8 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15277                                  					; if not fat system
 15278 000018BA E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15279 000018BD 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15280 000018BF E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15281 000018C2 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15282                                  					; definitely changed
 15283 000018C5 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15284                                  
 15285 000018C7 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15286                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15287 000018C8 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15288                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15289                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15290                                  		;clc
 15291                                  checkfatret:				
 15292 000018CB C3                      		retn
 15293                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15294                                  
 15295                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15296                                  changed_drv:
 15297 000018CC F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15298 000018CD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15299                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15300 000018D2 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15301                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15302                                  
 15303                                  ; extended id check
 15304                                  
 15305                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15306                                  
 15307                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15308                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15309                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15310                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15311                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15312                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15313                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15314                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15315                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15316                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15317                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15318                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15319                                  ;
 15320                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15321                                  
 15322                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15323                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15324 000018D3 50                      		push	ax
 15325                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15326                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15327 000018D4 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15328                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15329 000018D7 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15330 000018D9 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15331 000018DD 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15332 000018DF A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15333 000018E2 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15334 000018E6 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15335                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15336                                  					; don't know
 15337 000018E8 58                      		pop	ax
 15338 000018E9 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15339                                  					; reset the flag
 15340                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15341                                  
 15342                                  ext_changed:
 15343 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 15344                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15345 000018EC 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15346                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15347                                  					; disk changed!
 15348                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15349                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15350                                  		;clc
 15351 000018ED EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15352                                  
 15353                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15354                                  
 15355                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15356                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15357                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15358                                  ;
 15359                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15360                                  
 15361                                  checkio:				
 15362 000018EF 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15363 000018F2 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15364 000018F4 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15365 000018F7 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15366 000018F9 E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15367 000018FC 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15368 000018FE E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15369 00001901 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15370 00001903 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15371 00001905 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15372 00001907 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15373 00001908 C3                      		retn
 15374                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15375                                  
 15376                                  checkioerr:				
 15377 00001909 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15378                                  
 15379                                  checkioret:				
 15380 0000190C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15381 0000190D E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15382                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15383                                  
 15384                                  no_error_map:				
 15385 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15386                                  
 15387                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15388                                  
 15389                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15390                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15391                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15392                                  
 15393                                  returnvid:		
 15394 00001913 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15395                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15396 00001916 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15397 00001919 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15398 0000191B F9                      		stc
 15399 0000191C C3                      		retn
 15400                                  
 15401                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15402                                  
 15403                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15404                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15405                                  ;
 15406                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15407                                  ; **trashes si**
 15408                                  
 15409                                  media_set_vid:				
 15410 0000191D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15411                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15412                                  
 15413                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15414                                  
 15415                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15416                                  
 15417                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15418                                  
 15419                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15420                                  vid_into_packet:
 15421 00001920 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15422 00001921 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15423 00001925 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15424 00001928 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15425 0000192A 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15426 0000192D 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15427 00001930 1F                      		pop	ds
 15428                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15429 00001931 C3                      		retn
 15430                                  
 15431                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15432                                  
 15433                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15434                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15435                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15436                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15437                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15438                                  ;
 15439                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15440                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15441                                  ;
 15442                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15443                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15444                                  ;		carry set
 15445                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15446                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15447                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15448                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15449                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15450                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15451                                  ;
 15452                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15453                                  
 15454                                  hidensity:
 15455                                  
 15456                                  ; check for correct drive
 15457                                  		
 15458                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15459 00001932 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15460                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15461                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15462 00001937 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15463                                  
 15464                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15465                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15466                                  
 15467 00001939 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15468 0000193E 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15469                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15470                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15471 00001940 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15472 00001943 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15473                                  
 15474                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15475                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15476                                  
 15477                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15478 00001945 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15479 00001949 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15480                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15481                                  					; ffOther
 15482 0000194B 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15483 0000194D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15484                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15485                                  					; ff288
 15486 0000194F 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15487 00001951 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15488 00001953 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15489                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15490                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15491 00001956 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15492                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15493                                  					; 2 sides
 15494                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15495 00001959 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15496 0000195A BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15497                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15498                                  					; & head max
 15499                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15500 0000195D E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15501                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15502                                  
 15503                                  Is720K:
 15504                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15505 00001960 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15506                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15507 00001961 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15508                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15509                                  
 15510                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15511                                  ;dofloppy:
 15512                                  		;retn
 15513                                  
 15514                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15515                                  
 15516                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15517                                  
 15518                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15519                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15520                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15521                                  ;
 15522                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15523                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15524                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15525                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15526                                  ;
 15527                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15528                                  ;
 15529                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15530                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15531                                  
 15532                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15533 00001964 06                      		push	es
 15534 00001965 57                      		push	di
 15535                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15536                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15537 00001966 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15538                                  
 15539                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15540                                  
 15541                                  scan_bds:				
 15542 0000196A 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15543 0000196E 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15544                                  
 15545                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15546                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15547                                  
 15548 00001970 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15549                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15550                                  get_next_bds:				
 15551 00001974 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15552                                  					; go to	next bds
 15553 00001977 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15554 0000197A 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15555 0000197C 5F                      		pop	di
 15556 0000197D 07                      		pop	es
 15557 0000197E C3                      		retn
 15558                                  
 15559                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15560                                  
 15561                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15562                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15563                                  ;
 15564                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15565                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15566                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15567                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15568                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15569                                  
 15570                                  checkromchange:	
 15571                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15572                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15573 0000197F 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15574                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15575                                  					; fchanged
 15576 00001984 C3                      		retn
 15577                                  
 15578                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15579                                  
 15580                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15581                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15582                                  ;
 15583                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15584                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15585                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15586                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15587                                  
 15588                                  resetchanged:	
 15589                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15590                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15591 00001985 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15592                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15593                                  					; ~fchanged
 15594 0000198A C3                      		retn
 15595                                  
 15596                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15597                                  
 15598                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15599                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15600                                  ;
 15601                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15602                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15603                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15604                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15605                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15606                                  
 15607                                  haschange:
 15608                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15609                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15610 0000198B 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15611                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15612                                  					; fchangeline
 15613 00001990 C3                      		retn
 15614                                  
 15615                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15616                                  
 15617                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15618                                  
 15619                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15620                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15621                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15622                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15623                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15624                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15625                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15626                                  
 15627                                  ; set_volume_id
 15628                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15629                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15630                                  ;
 15631                                  ;   on entry:
 15632                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15633                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15634                                  ;
 15635                                  ;   on exit:
 15636                                  ;	carry clear:
 15637                                  ;	   successful call
 15638                                  ;	carry set
 15639                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15640                                  
 15641                                  set_volume_id:				
 15642 00001991 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15643 00001992 50                      		push	ax
 15644 00001993 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15645 00001996 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15646 00001998 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15647 0000199B 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15648 0000199D E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15649 000019A0 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15650                                  setvret:				
 15651                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15652                                  		; cf = 0
 15653                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15654 000019A3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15655 000019A4 5A                      		pop	dx
 15656 000019A5 C3                      		retn
 15657                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15658                                  
 15659                                  seterr:					
 15660 000019A6 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15661 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15662 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 15663                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15664 000019A9 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15665                                  
 15666                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15667                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15668                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15669                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15670                                  
 15671                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15672                                  
 15673                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15674                                  
 15675                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15676                                  ;
 15677                                  ;   on entry:
 15678                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15679                                  ;
 15680                                  ;   on exit:
 15681                                  ;	carry clear
 15682                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15683                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15684                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15685                                  ;
 15686                                  ;	carry set:
 15687                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15688                                  
 15689                                  read_volume_id:
 15690 000019AB 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15691 000019AC 51                      		push	cx
 15692 000019AD 53                      		push	bx
 15693 000019AE 50                      		push	ax
 15694 000019AF 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15695 000019B0 57                      		push	di
 15696 000019B1 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15697 000019B2 07                      		pop	es
 15698 000019B3 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15699 000019B6 BE[9E08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15700                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15701 000019B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15702 000019BC F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15703 000019BE 5F                      		pop	di
 15704 000019BF 07                      		pop	es
 15705 000019C0 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15706                                  					; # of fats
 15707 000019C4 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15708                                  					; sectors / fat
 15709 000019C8 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15710 000019CA 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15711                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15712                                  					;
 15713                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15714                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15715 000019CE 2EA3[A919]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15716                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15717                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15718 000019D2 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15719                                  					; # root dir entries
 15720 000019D6 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15721 000019D8 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15722                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15723                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15724 000019DA 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15725                                  next_sec:
 15726 000019DB 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15727 000019DC 2EA1[A919]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15728                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15729                                  					; get sector #
 15730 000019E0 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15731                                  					; sectors / track
 15732 000019E4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15733 000019E6 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15734                                  
 15735                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15736                                  
 15737 000019E8 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15738                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15739 000019E9 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15740 000019EB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15741 000019ED 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15742                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15743 000019F1 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15744 000019F3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15745 000019F5 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15746                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15747 000019F8 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15748 000019FA B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15749 000019FD B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15750                                  fvid_loop:
 15751                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15752 000019FF 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15753                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15754 00001A01 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15755 00001A03 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15756 00001A06 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15757 00001A08 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15758 00001A0B 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15759                                  ent_loop:
 15760 00001A0D 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15761 00001A10 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15762 00001A12 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15763 00001A13 2EFF06[A919]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15764                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15765                                  					; next sector
 15766 00001A18 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15767                                  notfound:
 15768                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15769                                  		;xor	si, si
 15770 00001A1A EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15771                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15772                                  
 15773                                  found_vid:
 15774                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15775                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15776 00001A1C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15777 00001A1D 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15778 00001A1F 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15779 00001A20 57                      		push	di
 15780 00001A21 1E                      		push	ds
 15781 00001A22 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15782 00001A23 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15783 00001A26 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15784                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15785 00001A29 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15786                                  		;xor	al, al
 15787                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15788 00001A2B 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15789 00001A2C AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15790                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15791                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15792                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15793 00001A2D 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15794 00001A2E 07                      		pop	es
 15795                                  fvid_ret:
 15796                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15797 00001A2F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15798                                  				
 15799 00001A31 58                      		pop	ax
 15800                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15801                                  		; cf = 0
 15802                                  		;clc
 15803                                  rvidret:
 15804 00001A32 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15805 00001A33 59                      		pop	cx
 15806 00001A34 5A                      		pop	dx
 15807 00001A35 C3                      		retn
 15808                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15809                                  
 15810                                  no_vid:
 15811 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15812                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15813                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15814 00001A37 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15815                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15816                                  
 15817                                  readviderr:
 15818 00001A39 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15819 00001A3A 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15820 00001A3B EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15821                                  
 15822                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15823                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15824                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15825                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15826 00001A3D BE[AA08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15827                                  		;
 15828                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15829                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15830                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15831                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15832 00001A40 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15833 00001A43 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15834                                  		;
 15835 00001A46 FC                      		cld
 15836 00001A47 C3                      		retn
 15837                                  
 15838                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15839                                  
 15840                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15841                                  ;
 15842                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15843                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15844                                  
 15845                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15846 00001A48 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15847 00001A49 56                      		push	si
 15848 00001A4A 51                      		push	cx
 15849                                  		
 15850                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15851                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15852                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15853                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15854                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15855                                  		;cld
 15856                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15857 00001A4B E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15858                                  
 15859 00001A4E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15860 00001A50 59                      		pop	cx
 15861 00001A51 5E                      		pop	si
 15862 00001A52 5F                      		pop	di
 15863 00001A53 C3                      		retn
 15864                                  
 15865                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15866                                  
 15867                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15868                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15869                                  ;
 15870                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15871                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15872                                  
 15873                                  check_volume_id:
 15874 00001A54 57                      		push	di
 15875 00001A55 51                      		push	cx
 15876                                  		
 15877                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15878                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15879                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15880                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15881                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15882                                  		;cld
 15883                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15884 00001A56 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15885                                  
 15886 00001A59 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15887 00001A5B 59                      		pop	cx
 15888 00001A5C 5F                      		pop	di
 15889 00001A5D C3                      		retn
 15890                                  
 15891                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15892                                  
 15893                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15894                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15895                                  ;
 15896                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15897                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15898                                  ;
 15899                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15900                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15901                                  ;
 15902                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15903                                  
 15904                                  fat_check:		
 15905 00001A5E 50                      		push	ax
 15906 00001A5F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15907 00001A61 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15908 00001A64 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15909                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15910 00001A68 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15911 00001A6A 4E                      		dec	si
 15912                                  okret1:					
 15913 00001A6B 58                      		pop	ax
 15914 00001A6C C3                      		retn
 15915                                  
 15916                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15917                                  
 15918                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15919                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15920                                  
 15921                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15922                                  
 15923                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15924                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15925                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15926                                  
 15927                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15928                                  
 15929                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15930                                  		;db 0
 15931                                  
 15932                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15933                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15934                                  
 15935                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15936 00001A6D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15937                                  %endif
 15938                                  
 15939                                  ;align 16
 15940                                  
 15941                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15942                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15943                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15944                                  BCODEEND:

 15946                                  ; 13/12/2022
