 34260                                  
 34261                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34262                                  
 34263                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34264                                  ;
 34265                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34266                                  ;
 34267                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34268                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34269                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34270                                  ;			; DS = data
 34271                                  ;
 34272                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34273                                  ;
 34274                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34275                                  ;
 34276                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34277                                  
 34278                                  umb_insert:
 34279 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 34280                                  
 34281                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34282                                  	; ds = cs
 34283                                  
 34284                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34285 00003279 8E1E[8A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34286                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34287 0000327D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34288 00003281 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34289 00003283 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34290                                  ui_next:
 34291 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34292                                  					;    new block
 34293 00003287 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34294                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34295                                  					;    last
 34296 00003289 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34297 0000328F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34298                                  					; N: get next block
 34299 00003291 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34300                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34301 00003293 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34302 00003296 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34303                                  
 34304                                  ui_insert:
 34305 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34306 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34307                                  
 34308 0000329B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34309 0000329D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34310                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34311 0000329F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34312                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34313 000032A4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34314                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34315 000032AA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34316                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34317 000032AE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34318                                  
 34319                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34320                                  
 34321 000032B4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34322 000032B6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34323 000032BC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34324                                  					; mark as free
 34325 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34326                                  					; start & end of new block
 34327 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34328                                  
 34329                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34330                                  	
 34331 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34332 000032CD 43                      	inc	bx
 34333 000032CE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34334 000032D0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34335                                  
 34336                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34337                                  					; this block
 34338 000032D1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34339                                  	
 34340 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34341 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34342 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34343 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34344                                  
 34345 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34346                                  
 34347                                  ui_append:
 34348                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34349 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34350 000032F2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34351                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34352                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34353                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34354 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34355                                  
 34356 000032FE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34357 00003300 40                      	inc	ax
 34358 00003301 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34359                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34360 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34361                                  
 34362 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34363                                  
 34364 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34365 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34366 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34367 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34368                                  
 34369                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34370 0000331F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34371 00003321 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34372 00003327 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34373                                  					; mark as free
 34374 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34375 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34376                                  ui_done:
 34377                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34378 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 34379                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34380                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34381                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34382 00003335 C3                      	retn

 34405                                  ;au_exit:
 34406                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 34407                                  ;	; ds = cs
 34408                                  ;	retn
 34409                                  
 34410                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34411                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce

 34413                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34414                                  
 34415                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34416                                  
 34417                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34418                                  ;
 34419                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34420                                  ;
 34421                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34422                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34423                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34424                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34425                                  ;
 34426                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34427                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34428                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34429                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34430                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34431                                  ;
 34432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34433                                  
 34434                                  umb_coalesce:
 34435                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34436                                  	; ds = cs
 34437 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34438                                  
 34439 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34440                                  
 34441                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34442                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34443 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34444 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34445                                  uc_nextfree:
 34446 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34447 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34448                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34449 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34450 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34451                                  					; N: get next arena
 34452 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34453 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34454 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34455                                  uc_again:
 34456 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34457 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34458                                  uc_check:
 34459 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34460 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34461                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34462 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34463 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34464                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34465 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34466 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34467 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34468 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34469                                  
 34470                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34471                                  ;uc_done:
 34472                                  	;retn

 34490 00003389 8C06[8A1F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later

 34492 00003390 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 34493                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 34494                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 34495 00003392 891E[731F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 34496 00003396 8C06[751F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 34497                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34498 0000339A 803E[891F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 34499                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 34500                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it

 34521                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34522                                  ;
 34523                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34524                                  ;
 34525                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34526                                  ;
 34527                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34528                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34529                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34530                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34531                                  ;				NC
 34532                                  ;			  else 
 34533                                  ;				CY
 34534                                  ;
 34535                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34536                                  ;
 34537                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34538                                  
 34539                                  umb_allocate:
 34540                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34541                                  	; ds = cs
 34542 000033AE 50                      	push	ax
 34543 000033AF B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34544 000033B1 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 34545                                  					;   possible
 34546                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34547 000033B4 FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34548                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34549                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34550                                  					; the largest UMB
 34551 000033B8 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34552 000033BA 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34553                                  	
 34554 000033BC B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34555                                  
 34556                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34557 000033BE FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34558                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34559                                  
 34560 000033C2 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 34561                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 34562                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34563 000033C5 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34564                                  ua_err:
 34565 000033C7 F9                      	stc	
 34566                                  
 34567                                  	;clc
 34568                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34569                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34570                                  	; cf=0
 34571                                  	;clc 
 34572                                  ua_done:
 34573 000033C8 58                      	pop	ax
 34574 000033C9 C3                      	retn
 34575                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34576                                  ;ua_err:
 34577                                  	;stc
 34578                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 34594                                  _get_next_:

 34602                                  	; cf=0

 34612                                  ;
 34613                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34614                                  ;
 34615                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34616

 34618                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 34619                                  LinkFirstUMB:

 34624

 34627

 34632 000033E4 B106                    	mov	cl,6

 34634

 34637

 34644

 34647

 34650

 34655 00003411 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34656                                  					; mark as free

 34658 00003419 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34659                                  
 34660                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34661                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34663                                  	; 18/09/2023

 34666                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34667                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34668                                  					;  just below Top of Mem

 34735 00003458 2B1E[6D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34736 0000345C 8E06[6D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34737                                  	
 34738 00003460 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34739 00003463 CD21                    	int	21h
 34740                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34741                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34742                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34743 00003465 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34744 00003467 48                      	dec	ax
 34745 00003468 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34746 0000346A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8

 34772                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34773 00003480 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34774 00003485 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34775                                  ulu_next:
 34776 0000348A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 34777 0000348D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x

 34779 00003491 7404                    	je	short ulu_found

 34790                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34791                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34792                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34793                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34794                                  
 34795                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34796                                  ;
 34797                                  ; Summary:
 34798                                  ;
 34799                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34800                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34801                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34802                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34803                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34804                                  ;
 34805                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34806                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34807                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34808                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34809                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34810                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34811                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34812                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34813                                  ;
 34814                                  ; Example:
 34815                                  ;
 34816                                  ;   [menu]
 34817                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34818                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34819                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34820                                  ;
 34821                                  ;   [network]
 34822                                  ;   include misc
 34823                                  ;   device=foo
 34824                                  ;
 34825                                  ;   [misc]
 34826                                  ;   device=bar
 34827                                  ;   include alternate
 34828                                  ;
 34829                                  ;   [alternate]
 34830                                  ;   device=tar
 34831                                  ;
 34832                                  ;
 34833                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34834                                  ;
 34835                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34836                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34837                                  ;
 34838                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34839                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34840                                  ;   following order:
 34841                                  ;
 34842                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34843                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34844                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34845                                  ;
 34846                                  
 34847                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34848                                  
 34849                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34850                                  
 34851                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34852                                  
 34853                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34854                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34855                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34856                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34857                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34858                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34859                                  
 34860                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34861                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34862                                  
 34863                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34864                                  
 34865                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34866                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34867                                  
 34868 0000349F 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 35005                                  ;
 35006                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35007                                  ;
 35008                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35009                                  ;
 35010                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35011                                  
 35012                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35013                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35014                                  
 35015                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35016                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35017                                  parseline:
 35018                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35019                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35020                                  
 35021                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35022                                  
 35023                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35024                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35025                                  
 35026                                  nextswtch:
 35027                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35028                                  	je	short done_line
 35029                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35030                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35031                                  
 35032                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35033                                  
 35034                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35035                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35036                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35037                                  	je	short getparm
 35038                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35039                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35040                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35041                                  swterr:
 35042                                  	retn
 35043                                  
 35044                                  getparm:
 35045                                  	call	check_switch
 35046                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35047                                  	jc	short swterr
 35048                                  getnext:
 35049                                  	call	getchr
 35050                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35051                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35052                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35053                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 35054                                  ;swterr:
 35055                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35056                                  
 35057                                  done_line:
 35058                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35059                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35060                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35061                                  	jnz	short okay
 35062                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35063                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35064                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35065                                  	retn
 35066                                  
 35067                                  okay:
 35068                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 35069                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 35070                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 35071                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 35072                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 35073                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35074                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35075                                  	; cf=0
 35076                                  	;clc
 35077                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 35078                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35079                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 35080                                  ;exitpl:
 35081                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35082                                  	; ds = cs
 35083                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35084                                  	retn
 35085                                  put_back:
 35086                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 35087                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35088                                  	jmp	short done_line
 35089                                  
 35090                                  %endif

 35093                                  ;
 35094                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35095                                  ;
 35096                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35097                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35098                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35099                                  ; error.
 35100                                  ;
 35101                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35102                                  
 35103                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35104                                  
 35105                                  err_swtch:
 35106 00003501 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35107                                  err_check:
 35108 00003503 F9                      	stc
 35109                                  err_chk:
 35110                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35111 00003504 C3                      	retn
 35112                                  
 35113                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35114                                  
 35115                                  check_switch:
 35116 00003505 E8240D                  	call	getchr
 35117                                  	;jc	short err_check
 35118 00003508 72FA                    	jc	short err_chk
 35119 0000350A 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 35120 0000350C 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 35121                                  	;jb	short err_check
 35122 0000350E 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35123 00003510 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 35124 00003512 77EF                    	ja	short err_check
 35125                                  
 35126 00003514 06                      	push	es
 35127                                  
 35128 00003515 0E                      	push	cs
 35129 00003516 07                      	pop	es

 35131                                  	;mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 35132                                  	;mov	ch,0
 35133                                  	;mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 35134                                  	; 09/09/2023

 35136 0000351A 8A0D                    	mov	cl,[di]
 35137 0000351C B500                    	mov	ch,0
 35138 0000351E 47                      	inc	di	; 1+switchlist
 35139                                  
 35140 0000351F F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 35141                                  
 35142 00003521 07                      	pop	es
 35143 00003522 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check
 35144                                  
 35145 00003524 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 35146 00003527 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 35147 00003529 8B1E[5C49]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 35148 0000352D 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 35149 0000352F 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 35150                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35151 00003531 A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 35152                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 35153 00003533 74CF                    	jz	short done_swtch

 35157

 35159 0000353C 75C3                    	jne	short err_swtch
 35160                                  
 35161 0000353E E8EB0C                  	call	getchr
 35162 00003541 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 35163                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35164                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 35165                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35166                                  	; ds = cs

 35170                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35171 0000354A C606[AE02]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 35172 0000354F 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 35173                                  
 35174                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 35175                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 35176                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 35177                                  
 35178                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35179                                  	;call	process_num
 35180                                  	;jmp	short process_num
 35181                                  
 35182                                  ;done_swtch:
 35183                                  ;	;clc

 35190                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35191                                  ;
 35192                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35193                                  ;
 35194                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35195                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35196                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35197                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35198                                  ;
 35199                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35200                                  
 35201                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35202                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35203                                  process_num:
 35204 00003550 850E[5C49]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 35205 00003554 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35206                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35207 00003556 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35208                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35209 00003559 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35210 0000355B A2[5B49]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35211                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)

 35278                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35279                                  ;
 35280                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35281                                  ;
 35282                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35283                                  
 35284                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35285                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35286                                  
 35287                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35288                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35289                                  parseline:
 35290                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35291                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35292                                  
 35293                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35294                                  
 35295                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35296                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35297                                  
 35298                                  nextswtch:
 35299 00003582 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35300 00003584 741C                    	je	short done_line
 35301 00003586 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35302 00003588 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35303                                  
 35304                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35305                                  
 35306 0000358A 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35307 0000358C 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35308 0000358E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 35309 00003590 7402                    	je	short getparm
 35310 00003592 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35311                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35312                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35313                                  swterr:
 35314 00003593 C3                      	retn
 35315                                  
 35316                                  getparm:
 35317 00003594 E86EFF                  	call	check_switch
 35318 00003597 891E[5C49]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35319 0000359B 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 35320                                  getnext:
 35321 0000359D E88C0C                  	call	getchr
 35322                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35323                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35324                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35325 000035A0 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 35326                                  ;swterr:
 35327                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35328                                  
 35329                                  done_line:
 35330                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35331 000035A2 F606[5C49]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35332                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35333 000035A7 750C                    	jnz	short okay

 35335                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35336                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35337 000035AA C3                      	retn
 35338                                  
 35339                                  ;exitpl:
 35340                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35341                                  	; ds = cs
 35342                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 35343                                  	;retn
 35344                                  
 35345                                  put_back:

 35347 000035AF FF0E[5A03]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35348 000035B3 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 35349

 35368                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35369                                  ;
 35370                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35371                                  ;
 35372                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35373                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35374                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35375                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35376                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35377                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35378                                  ;
 35379                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35380                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35381                                  ;
 35382                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35383                                  ;
 35384                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35385                                  
 35386                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35387                                  
 35388                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35389                                  
 35390                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35391                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35392                                  
 35393                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35394                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35395                                  
 35396                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35397                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35398                                  	; ds = cs
 35399                                  
 35400 000035C4 06                      	push	es
 35401                                  
 35402 000035C5 0E                      	push	cs
 35403 000035C6 07                      	pop	es
 35404                                  
 35405 000035C7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35406 000035C9 8A1E[3448]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 35407 000035CD 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35408 000035D0 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 35409                                  
 35410 000035D2 C706[3748]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35411                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35412                                  got_80:
 35413 000035D8 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 35414 000035DA 8BB7[DC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 35415                                  
 35416                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 35417                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35418 000035DE BF[3A48]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 35419 000035E1 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31

 35423                                  	;repe	movsb
 35424                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35425 000035E5 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 35426

 35428                                  
 35429                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35430 000035E8 F606[5C49]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35431                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35432 000035ED 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 35433

 35435                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 35436 000035F2 A3[4748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 35437                                  
 35438                                  see_heads:
 35439                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35440 000035F5 F606[5C49]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35441                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35442 000035FA 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 35443                                  
 35444 000035FC A1[5749]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 35445                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 35446 000035FF A3[4948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 35447                                  
 35448                                  heads_not_altered:
 35449                                  
 35450                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 35451                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 35452                                  
 35453                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 35454                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35455                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 35456                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35457 00003602 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 35458 00003605 A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 35459                                  
 35460 00003608 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 35461                                  
 35462                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 35463                                  
 35464                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 35465                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35466 0000360A 8A3E[4448]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 35467                                  	
 35468                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35469                                  	; ax = 2
 35470 0000360E 3906[4948]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 35471                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 35472 00003612 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 35473                                  
 35474 00003614 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 35475                                  
 35476                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35477                                  
 35478 00003616 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35479                                  
 35480                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35481                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35482                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35483                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35484                                  
 35485                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35486                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35487                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35488                                  
 35489 00003618 833E[4748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35490 0000361D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35491 0000361F 833E[3748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35492 00003624 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35493                                  
 35494                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35495                                  
 35496 00003626 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35497                                  
 35498                                  ;	check for 320K
 35499                                  
 35500                                  not_144m:
 35501 00003628 833E[3748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35502 0000362D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35503 0000362F 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35504 00003634 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35505                                  
 35506 00003636 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 35507 00003638 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 35508                                  
 35509                                  only_one_head:
 35510                                  
 35511                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35512                                  
 35513 0000363A 803E[3448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35514 0000363F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35515                                  
 35516                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 35517                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 35518                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 35519                                  
 35520 00003641 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 35521 00003643 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35522                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35523 00003648 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 35524                                  
 35525 0000364A B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 35526                                  
 35527                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 35528                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 35529                                  
 35530                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 35531                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35532                                  	; ax = 2
 35533 0000364C 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 35534 0000364D A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 35535                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 35536                                  
 35537                                  got_correct_mediad:
 35538 00003650 881E[4448]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 35539                                  
 35540                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 35541                                  
 35542 00003654 A1[3748]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 35543 00003657 F726[4948]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 35544 0000365B F726[4748]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35545 0000365F A3[4248]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 35546 00003662 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 35547                                  
 35548 00003663 C3                      	retn
 35549                                  
 35550                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine

 36101                                  ;
 36102                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36103                                  ;
 36104                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36105                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36106                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36107                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36108                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36109                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36110                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36111                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36112                                  ;
 36113                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36114                                  
 36115                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36116                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)

 36142 0000388C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36143                                  	
 36144 00003890 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36145                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36146 00003894 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36147                                  skip_cmmt:
 36148 00003896 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36149 00003898 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36150 0000389B 46                      	inc	si
 36151 0000389C 49                      	dec	cx
 36152 0000389D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36153 0000389F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36154                                  no_commt:
 36155 000038A1 C3                      	retn

 36157                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36158                                  ; (SYSINIT:42C8h)
 36159                                  
 36160                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36161                                  ;%if 0

 36165                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36166                                  ;
 36167                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36168                                  ;
 36169                                  ;   INPUT
 36170                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36171                                  ;
 36172                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36173                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36174                                  ;
 36175                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36176                                  ;       All
 36177                                  ;
 36178                                  ;   HISTORY
 36179                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36180                                  ;
 36181                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36182                                  
 36183                                  kbd_read:
 36184 000038A2 F606[FF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36185 000038A7 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36186                                  
 36187 000038A9 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36188 000038AA 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36189 000038AC 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36190                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36191                                  kbd_loop:
 36192 000038AE B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36193 000038B0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36194 000038B2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36195 000038B4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36196 000038B6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36197 000038B8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36198 000038BA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36199 000038BC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36200                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36201                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36202 000038BF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36203                                  
 36204 000038C4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36205 000038C6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36206                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36207 000038C8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36208                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36209 000038C9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36210 000038CB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36211 000038CD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36212 000038CF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36213 000038D1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36214 000038D3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36215 000038D4 43                              inc     bx
 36216                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36217 000038D5 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36218                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36219 000038DA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36220 000038DC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36221 000038DE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36222 000038E0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36223 000038E2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36224                                  
 36225                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36226 000038E4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36227 000038E7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36228                                  	
 36229 000038E9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36230 000038EC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36231                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36232 000038EE BA[974B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36233 000038F1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 36234                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36235 000038F4 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36236 000038F9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36237                                  kbd_notf5:
 36238                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36239 000038FB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36240 000038FE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36241                                  
 36242 00003900 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36243 00003903 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36244                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36245 00003905 BA[D54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36246 00003908 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36247 0000390B B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36248 0000390D 881E[0347]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36249                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36250 00003911 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36251 00003913 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36252 00003915 C606[0947]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36253 0000391A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36254 0000391C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36255                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36256 0000391E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36257 00003921 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36258                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36259 00003923 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36260 00003926 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36261 00003927 C3                              retn			;
 36262                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36263 00003928 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36264 00003929 C3                              retn			;
 36265                                  
 36266                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36267                                  ;
 36268                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36269                                  ;
 36270                                  ;   INPUT
 36271                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36272                                  ;
 36273                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36274                                  ;       None
 36275                                  ;
 36276                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36277                                  ;       None
 36278                                  ;
 36279                                  ;   HISTORY
 36280                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36281                                  ;
 36282                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36283                                  
 36284                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36285                                  
 36286                                  set_numlock:
 36287                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36288                                  	;push	ax
 36289 0000392A 1E                              push    ds
 36290 0000392B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36291 0000392D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36292 0000392F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36293 00003932 2E3B06[724B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36294 00003937 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36295 00003939 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36296 0000393E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36297                                  not_off:
 36298 00003940 2E3B06[704B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36299 00003945 F9                              stc
 36300 00003946 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36301 00003948 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36302                                  set_done:
 36303 0000394D 1F                              pop     ds
 36304                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36305                                  	;pop	ax
 36306 0000394E C3                              retn
 36307                                  
 36308                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36309                                  
 36310                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36311                                  ;
 36312                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36313                                  ;
 36314                                  ;   INPUT
 36315                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36316                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36317                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36318                                  ;
 36319                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36320                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36321                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36322                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36323                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36324                                  ;
 36325                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36326                                  ;       All
 36327                                  ;
 36328                                  ;   NOTES
 36329                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36330                                  ;
 36331                                  ;   HISTORY
 36332                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36333                                  ;
 36334                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36335                                  
 36336                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36337                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36338                                  
 36339                                  menu_check:
 36340                                  
 36341                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36342                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36343                                  
 36344 0000394F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36345 00003950 56                              push    si              ;
 36346 00003951 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36347                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36348 00003953 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36349 00003956 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36350 00003958 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36351 0000395A 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 36352 0000395C 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 36353 0000395D EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36354                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 36355 0000395F 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36356 00003961 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 36357 00003963 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 36358 00003965 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 36359 00003967 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 36360 0000396A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 36361 0000396F EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36362                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 36363 00003971 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 36364 00003973 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 36365                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 36366 00003975 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 36367                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 36368 00003978 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 36369 0000397A 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 36370 0000397C 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 36371 0000397E 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 36372 00003980 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 36373 00003983 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 36374 00003985 3A06[B91E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]	; 'N'
 36375 00003989 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 36376 0000398B 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36377 00003990 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36378                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 36379 00003992 3A06[C51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]	; 'F'
 36380 00003996 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 36381 00003998 800E[FF46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 36382 0000399D EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36383                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 36384 0000399F E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36385 000039A2 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 36386                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 36387 000039A4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36388 000039A5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36389                                  
 36390                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 36391                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 36392                                  
 36393 000039A6 F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36394 000039AB 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 36395                                  ;
 36396                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 36397                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 36398                                  ;
 36399 000039AD E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 36400 000039B0 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 36401 000039B2 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 36402                                  
 36403                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 36404                                  
 36405                                  menu_search:
 36406 000039B5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 36407 000039B7 BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 36408 000039BA E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 36409 000039BD 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 36410 000039BF C606[3C47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 36411 000039C4 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 36412                                  
 36413                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 36414                                  
 36415                                  menu_color:
 36416 000039C7 51                      	push	cx              ;
 36417 000039C8 52                      	push	dx              ;
 36418                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 36419                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36420                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 36421 000039C9 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 36422 000039CC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 36423 000039CF 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 36424                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 36425                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 36426                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 36427                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 36428 000039D1 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 36429 000039D3 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 36430 000039D6 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 36431 000039D8 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 36432 000039DB 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 36433 000039DE 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 36434                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36435                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 36436 000039E0 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 36437 000039E2 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 36438 000039E4 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 36439                                  check_color:
 36440 000039E6 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 36441 000039E8 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 36442 000039EA 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36443                                  set_color:
 36444 000039ED 8816[FA46]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 36445 000039F1 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 36446 000039F2 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 36447 000039F3 E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 36448                                  
 36449                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 36450                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 36451                                  
 36452                                  menu_found:
 36453 000039F6 C606[0447]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 36454                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 36455 000039FB C606[0847]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36456 00003A00 8026[0347]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 36457                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36458 00003A05 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 36459 00003A07 8916[0647]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 36460                                  
 36461 00003A0B E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 36462                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36463                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 36464                                  
 36465                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 36466                                  
 36467                                  menu_process:
 36468 00003A0E E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36469 00003A11 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 36470 00003A13 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36471 00003A15 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 36472 00003A17 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 36473 00003A19 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
