 37517 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37518 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37519 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37520 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37521 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37522 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37523 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37524 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37525 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37526 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37527 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37528 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 37529 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37530 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37531 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37532                                  input_key:
 37533 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37534 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37535 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37536 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37537 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37538 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37539 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37540 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37541 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37542 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37543 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37544 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37545 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37546                                  got_time:
 37547 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37548 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37549 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37550 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37551                                  got_key:
 37552 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37553 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37554 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37555 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37556 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37557 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37558 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37559 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37560 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37561 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37562 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37563                                  
 37564                                  timeout_disabled:
 37565 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37566 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37567 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37568 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37569 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37570                                  
 37571 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37572 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37573 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37574 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37575 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37576 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37577 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37578 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37579                                  not_up:
 37580 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37581 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37582 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37583 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37584 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37585 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37586 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37587                                  print1: 
 37588 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37589                                  print2: 
 37590 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37591 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37592                                  to_input_key:
 37593 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37594                                  not_down:
 37595 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37596 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37597 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37598 00003F96 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37599 00003F98 8036[0347]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37600 00003F9D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37601 00003FA0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37602                                  not_f8:
 37603 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37604 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37605                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37606                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37607                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 37608 00003FA7 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 37609 00003FAC BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 37610 00003FAF B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 37611 00003FB1 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 37612                                  
 37613                                  normal_key:
 37614 00003FB3 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 37615 00003FB5 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 37616 00003FB7 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 37617 00003FB9 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no

 37619 00003FBE C3                              retn			;
 37620                                  not_backspace:

 37622 00003FC1 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no

 37624 00003FC7 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no

 37626 00003FCC E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 37627 00003FCF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection

 37629                                  
 37630                                  select_done:

 37632 00003FD5 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37633 00003FD7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37634                                  
 37635                                  	; fall into disp_input

 37640                                  ;
 37641                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 37642                                  ;
 37643                                  ;   INPUT
 37644                                  ;       AL == character to display
 37645                                  ;
 37646                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37647                                  ;       None
 37648                                  ;
 37649                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37650                                  ;       None
 37651                                  ;
 37652                                  ;   NOTES
 37653                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37654                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37655                                  ;
 37656                                  ;   HISTORY
 37657                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37658                                  ;
 37659                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37660                                  
 37661                                  
 37662                                  disp_input:
 37663 00003FD9 50                      	push	ax
 37664                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 37665                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 37666                                  	;mov	al,' '
 37667                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 37668 00003FDA B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 37669 00003FDC 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 37670 00003FDE 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 37671                                  disp_ok:
 37672 00003FE0 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 37673                                  disp_input_ok:
 37674 00003FE2 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37675 00003FE4 CD21                    	int	21h
 37676 00003FE6 BA[1E4A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 37677 00003FE9 E8E504                  	call	print
 37678 00003FEC 58                      	pop	ax
 37679 00003FED C3                      	retn
 37680

 37690 00003FFC 5B                              pop     bx
 37691 00003FFD C3                              retn

 37702                                  ;

 37705                                  ;
 37706                                  ;   NOTES

 37714                                  show_status:
 37715 00003FFE 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37716 00003FFF 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37717 00004003 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37718 00004005 CD10                            int     10h             ;

 37731                                  show_onoff: 
 37732 00004021 CD10                            int     10h
 37733                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37734                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37735                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37736                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 37737

 37744                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023

 37755                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37756                                  ;
 37757                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37758                                  ;
 37759                                  ;   INPUT
 37760                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37761                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37762                                  ;
 37763                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37764                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37765                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37766                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37767                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37768                                  ;
 37769                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37770                                  ;       AX
 37771                                  ;
 37772                                  ;   NOTES
 37773                                  ;       None
 37774                                  ;
 37775                                  ;   HISTORY
 37776                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37777                                  ;
 37778                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37779                                  
 37780                                  skip_token:
 37781 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 37782 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37783 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37784 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37785                                  skip_check_eol:
 37786 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37787 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37788 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37789 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37790 0000404D F8                              clc
 37791                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37792 0000404E C3                      	retn
 37793                                  skip_token_eol:
 37794 0000404F F9                              stc
 37795                                  skip_token_done:
 37796 00004050 C3                              retn
 37797                                  
 37798                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37799                                  ;
 37800                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37801                                  ;
 37802                                  ;   INPUT
 37803                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37804                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37805                                  ;
 37806                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37807                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37808                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37809                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37810                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37811                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37812                                  ;
 37813                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37814                                  ;       AX
 37815                                  ;
 37816                                  ;   NOTES
 37817                                  ;       None
 37818                                  ;
 37819                                  ;   HISTORY
 37820                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37821                                  ;
 37822                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37823                                  
 37824                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37825 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37826 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37827 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37828 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37829 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37830 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37831                                  
 37832                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37833                                  ;
 37834                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37835                                  ;
 37836                                  ;   INPUT
 37837                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37838                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37839                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37840                                  ;
 37841                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37842                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37843                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37844                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37845                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37846                                  ;
 37847                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37848                                  ;       AX
 37849                                  ;
 37850                                  ;   NOTES
 37851                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37852                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37853                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37854                                  ;
 37855                                  ;   HISTORY
 37856                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37857                                  ;
 37858                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37859                                  
 37860                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37861                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37862                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37863                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37864                                       
 37865                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37866                                  
 37867                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37868                                  ;
 37869                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37870                                  ;
 37871                                  ;   INPUT
 37872                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37873                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37874                                  ;
 37875                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37876                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37877                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37878                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37879                                  ;
 37880                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37881                                  ;       AX
 37882                                  ;
 37883                                  ;   NOTES
 37884                                  ;       None
 37885                                  ;
 37886                                  ;   HISTORY
 37887                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37888                                  ;
 37889                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37890                                  
 37891                                  skip_line:
 37892 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 37893 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37894                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37895 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37896 00004067 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37897                                  skip_line_done:
 37898                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37899 00004069 C3                              retn
 37900                                  
 37901                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37902                                  ;
 37903                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37904                                  ;
 37905                                  ;   INPUT
 37906                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37907                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37908                                  ;
 37909                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37910                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37911                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37912                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37913                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37914                                  ;
 37915                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37916                                  ;       AX
 37917                                  ;
 37918                                  ;   NOTES
 37919                                  ;       None
 37920                                  ;
 37921                                  ;   HISTORY
 37922                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37923                                  ;
 37924                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37925                                  
 37926                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37927                                  
 37928                                  get_number:
 37929 0000406A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37930                                  num_loop:
 37931 0000406C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37932 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37933 00004071 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37934 00004073 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37935 00004075 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37936 00004077 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37937 00004079 50                              push    ax              ;
 37938 0000407A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37939 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 37940 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37941 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37942 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37943 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37944 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37945 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 37946 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37947 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37948                                  
 37949                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37950                                  ;num_done:
 37951                                          ;retn
 37952                                  
 37953                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37954                                  ;
 37955                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37956                                  ;
 37957                                  ;   INPUT
 37958                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37959                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37960                                  ;
 37961                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37962                                  ;       AL == next character
 37963                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37964                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37965                                  ;
 37966                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37967                                  ;       AX
 37968                                  ;
 37969                                  ;   NOTES
 37970                                  ;       None
 37971                                  ;
 37972                                  ;   HISTORY
 37973                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37974                                  ;
 37975                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37976                                  
 37977                                  get_char:
 37978 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37979 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37980                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37981 00004090 26                      	es	
 37982 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 37983 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37984 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 37985                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37986 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37987                                  nearby_ret:
 37988 00004098 C3                              retn
 37989                                  
 37990                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37991                                  ;
 37992                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37993                                  ;
 37994                                  ;   INPUT
 37995                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37996                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37997                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37998                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37999                                  ;
 38000                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38001                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38002                                  ;
 38003                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38004                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38005                                  ;

 38018                                  query_user:
 38019 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38020                                  	; 01/01/2023

 38022 000040A0 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38023                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38024                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38025                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38026                                  qu_1:
 38027 000040A3 F606[0347]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38028 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38029 000040AA 50                              push    ax                      ;

 38031 000040AE F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38032 000040B3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38033 000040B5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38034                                  	; 01/01/2023

 38044                                  query_all:
 38045                                  
 38046                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38047                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38048                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38049                                  
 38050 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38051 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38052 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38053 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38054                                  
 38055 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38056 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38057 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38058                                  find_match:                             ;
 38059 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38060 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38061 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38062 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38063 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38064 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38065 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38066                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38067 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38068                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38069 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38070 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38071 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38072                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38073 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38074 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38075 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38076 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38077 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38078 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38079 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38080 000040EF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38081 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38082                                  cmd_notset:
 38083 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38084                                  line_print:                             ;
 38085                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38086 000040F5 26                              es
 38087 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 38088 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38089 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38090 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38091                                  non_null:                               ;
 38092 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38093 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38094 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38095                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38096 00004103 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38097                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38098 00004106 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38099                                  non_space:                              ;
 38100 00004108 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38101 0000410A B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38102 0000410C CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38103 0000410E EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38104                                  
 38105                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38106 00004110 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38107                                  
 38108                                  generic_prompt:
 38109 00004113 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38110                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38111 00004116 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38112 00004118 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38113 0000411A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38114 0000411C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38115 0000411E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38116 00004121 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38117 00004123 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 38118 00004126 800E[0347]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38119 0000412B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38120                                  not_func:
 38121 0000412D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38122 0000412F 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38123 00004133 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38124 00004135 3A06[B84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38125 00004139 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38126 0000413B 803E[B814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38127 00004140 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38128 00004142 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38129 00004144 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38130 00004146 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38131 0000414B A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38132                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38133 0000414E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38134 00004151 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38135                                  
 38136 00004152 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38137 00004156 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38138                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38139 00004158 F8                      	clc
 38140                                  do_cmd:
 38141 00004159 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38142                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38143                                  	; cf=0
 38144                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38145 0000415A C3                      	retn
 38146                                  
 38147                                  skip_cmd:

 38149                                  skip_all:

 38151 0000415E F9                      	stc
 38152 0000415F C3                      	retn

 38209                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38210                                  
 38211                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38212                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38213                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38214                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38215                                  
 38216                                  disable_autoexec:
 38217                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38218                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38219                                  
 38220 00004194 F606[0347]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38221 00004199 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38222 0000419B F606[F946]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38223 000041A0 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38224 000041A2 800E[F946]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38225                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38226 000041A7 810E[0347]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38227 000041AD BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38228                                  dae_1:
 38229                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38230 000041B0 A0[3846]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38231                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38232 000041B3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38233 000041B5 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38234 000041B7 8A1E[3946]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38235 000041BB B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38236 000041BD 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38237 000041BF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38238 000041C2 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38239 000041C5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38240 000041C7 881E[3946]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38241 000041CB 81C3[3A46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38242 000041CF 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38243                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38244 000041D0 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38245 000041D3 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38246 000041D5 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38247 000041D6 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38248 000041D8 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38249                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38250 000041DB 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38251                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38252                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38253 000041DE C3                              retn
 38254

 38393                                  ; 
 38394                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38395                                  ;
 38396                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38397                                  
 38398                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38399                                  
 38400                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38401                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38402                                  mapcase:
 38403 00004243 51                      	push	cx
 38404 00004244 56                      	push	si
 38405 00004245 1E                      	push	ds
 38406                                  
 38407 00004246 06                      	push	es
 38408 00004247 1F                      	pop	ds
 38409                                  
 38410                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38411                                  
 38412                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38413                                  
 38414                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38415 00004248 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38416                                  ;else
 38417                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38418                                  ;endif
 38419                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38420                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38421                                  	;xor	si, si
 38422                                  
 38423                                  convloop:
 38424 0000424A AC                      	lodsb
 38425 0000424B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38426 0000424D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38427 0000424F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38428 00004251 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38429 00004253 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38430 00004255 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38431                                  noconv:
 38432                                  
 38433                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38434                                  
 38435                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38436                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38437                                  
 38438                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38439                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38440                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38441                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38442                                  ;
 38443 00004258 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38444 0000425B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38445 0000425D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38446 0000425F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38447                                  check_eol:
 38448 00004261 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38449 00004263 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38450 00004265 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38451 00004267 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38452                                  ;endif
 38453                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38454 00004269 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38455                                  convdone:
 38456 0000426B 1F                      	pop	ds
 38457 0000426C 5E                      	pop	si
 38458 0000426D 59                      	pop	cx
 38459 0000426E C3                      	retn

 38463                                  ; procedure : round
 38464                                  ;
 38465                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 38466                                  ; perform bounds check.
 38467                                  ;
 38468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38469                                  
 38470                                  round:
 38471                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38472 0000426F 1E                      	push	ds
 38473 00004270 0E                      	push	cs
 38474 00004271 1F                      	pop	ds
 38475                                  
 38476 00004272 50                      	push	ax
 38477                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 38478 00004273 A1[6203]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 38479                                  
 38480 00004276 E8D2CE                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 38481                                  
 38482                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 38483 00004279 0106[6403]              	add	[memhi],ax
 38484                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 38485 0000427D C706[6203]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 38486                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 38487 00004283 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 38488                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 38489 00004286 3B06[A502]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 38490                                  	;jae	short mem_err
 38491                                  	; 17/09/2023
 38492 0000428A 7322                    	jae	short mem_err2 ; ds = cs
 38493                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 38494 0000428C F606[BD14]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 38495 00004291 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 38496 00004293 06                      	push	es
 38497 00004294 56                      	push	si
 38498                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 38499 00004295 8B36[BB14]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 38500 00004299 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 38501 0000429B 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 38502 0000429D 48                      	dec	ax
 38503                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 38504 0000429E 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph

 38562                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 38563                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38564 000042DC 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 38565                                  	;cmp	al,9
 38566                                  	;ja	short notdig
 38567                                  	;clc
 38568                                  	;retn
 38569                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38570 000042DE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10

 38577                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38578                                  ;
 38579                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38580                                  ;
 38581                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38582                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38583                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38584                                  ;
 38585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38586                                  
 38587                                  getnum:
 38588 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 38589 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38590                                  b2:
 38591 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38592 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38593                                  
 38594 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38595 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38596                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38597                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38598 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38599 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38600 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38601 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38602 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38603 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38604                                  
 38605 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38606                                  
 38607 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 38608 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38609 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38610 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38611 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38612 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38613 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38614 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 38615 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38616 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 38617 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38618                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38619                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38620                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38621                                  	;nop
 38622 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 38623 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38624 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 38625 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38626 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 38627 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38628 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38629                                  b15:
 38630 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38631 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38632                                  b1:
 38633 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38634 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38635 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 38636 00004330 C3                      	retn
 38637                                  badnum:
 38638                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38639                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38640 00004331 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38641                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38642 00004333 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38643 00004337 5B                      	pop	bx
 38644 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38645 00004339 C3                      	retn
 38646

 38648                                  
 38649                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38650                                  
 38651                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38652                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38653                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38654                                  ;	si = 0
 38655                                  ;	ax = country id
 38656                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38657                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38658                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38659                                  ;
 38660                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38661                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38662                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38663                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38664                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38665                                  
 38666                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38667                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38668                                  
 38669                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38670                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 38671                                  
 38672 0000433A 57                      	push	di
 38673 0000433B 50                      	push	ax
 38674 0000433C 52                      	push	dx
 38675                                  
 38676 0000433D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38677 0000433F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38678 00004341 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38679 00004344 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38680 00004347 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38681                                  
 38682 00004349 06                      	push	es
 38683 0000434A 56                      	push	si
 38684                                  
 38685 0000434B 0E                      	push	cs
 38686 0000434C 07                      	pop	es
 38687                                  
 38688 0000434D BF[9E45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38689 00004350 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38690 00004353 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38691                                  
 38692 00004355 5E                      	pop	si
 38693 00004356 07                      	pop	es
 38694 00004357 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38695                                  
 38696 00004359 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38697 0000435C 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38698 0000435F 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38699                                  
 38700 00004361 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38701 00004362 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38702 00004364 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38703 00004367 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38704 0000436A E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38705 0000436D 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38706                                  
 38707 0000436F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38708 00004371 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38709 00004375 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38710                                  
 38711 00004377 46                      	inc	si
 38712 00004378 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38713 00004379 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38714 0000437A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 38715 0000437B 5F                      	pop	di
 38716                                  
 38717                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 38718 0000437C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 38719 0000437F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 38720                                  
 38721                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 38722                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 38723                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38724 00004381 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 38725 00004383 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 38726 00004385 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 38727 00004388 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 38728                                  
 38729                                  setdoscntry_next:
 38730 0000438A 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 38731 0000438C 46                      	inc	si
 38732 0000438D 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 38733 0000438E E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 38734                                  
 38735                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 38736                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38737 00004390 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 38738                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 38739 00004391 F9                      	stc
 38740 00004392 C3                      	retn
 38741                                  
 38742                                  setdosdata_fail:
 38743 00004393 5E                      	pop	si
 38744 00004394 59                      	pop	cx
 38745 00004395 5F                      	pop	di
 38746 00004396 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 38747                                  
 38748                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 38749 00004398 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 38750                                  
 38751                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 38752 0000439B 2E8916[A645]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 38753 000043A0 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 38754 000043A3 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 38755 000043A6 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 38756 000043A9 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 38757 000043AC 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 38758

 38765 000043B3 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left

 38767

 38769 000043B8 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di

 38771

 38773 000043C0 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38774 000043C3 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38775 000043C6 F9                      	stc
 38776 000043C7 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38777 000043C9 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38778                                  
 38779 000043CB BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38780 000043CE B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 38781 000043D1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 38782 000043D3 F9                      	stc
 38783 000043D4 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 38784 000043D6 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 38785                                  
 38786 000043D8 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38787 000043DA 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 38788                                  
 38789 000043DC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 38790 000043DF 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38791 000043E2 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38792 000043E5 F9                      	stc
 38793 000043E6 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 38794 000043E8 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38795                                  
 38796 000043EA 56                      	push	si
 38797 000043EB BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 38798 000043EE 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 38799 000043F0 5E                      	pop	si
 38800 000043F1 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38801 000043F4 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 38802 000043F7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 38803 000043F9 F9                      	stc
 38804 000043FA CD21                    	int	21h
 38805 000043FC 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38806                                  
 38807 000043FE 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38808 00004400 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 38809                                  
 38810 00004402 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 38811 00004405 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 38812 00004408 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 38813 0000440A 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 38814 0000440B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 38815 0000440C 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 38816 00004410 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38817                                  
 38818                                  	;if	bugfix
 38819 00004412 E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 38820                                  	;endif
 38821                                  
 38822 00004415 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 38823 00004417 7511                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry

 38912                                  getcountrydestination:
 38913                                  
 38914                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38915                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38916                                  ;
 38917                                  ;input: al - data id
 38918                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38919                                  ;on return:
 38920                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38921                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38923                                  
 38924                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38925                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38926                                  
 38927                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38928                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 38929

 38932 00004460 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38933                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38934 00004463 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38935 00004466 47                      	inc	di
 38936 00004467 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 38937                                  
 38938                                  getcntrydest:
 38939 00004468 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 38940 0000446B 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 38941                                  
 38942 0000446D 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 38943 00004471 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 38944                                  
 38945 00004473 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 38946 00004476 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 38947                                  
 38948                                  getcntrydest_1:
 38949                                  	;add	di,41
 38950 00004478 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 38951                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 38952 0000447B E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 38953 0000447D F9                      	stc
 38954                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38955                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 38956                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38957 0000447E 59                      	pop	cx
 38958 0000447F C3                      	retn
 38959                                  
 38960                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 38961                                  	; 10/09/2023

 38973                                  
 38974                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 38975                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 38976                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38977 00004485 26C43D                  	les	di,[es:di]
 38978                                  ;getcntrydest_exit:
 38979 00004488 59                      	pop	cx
 38980 00004489 C3                      	retn
 38981                                  
 38982                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38983                                  
 38984                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38985                                  
 38986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38987                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38988                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38989                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38990                                  ;
 38991                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38992                                  ;	 be moved.
 38993                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38994                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38995                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38996                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38997                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38998                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38999                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39000                                  
 39001 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39002 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39003 0000448E F9                      	stc
 39004 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39005 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39006 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39007                                  
 39008 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39009 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39010 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39011 0000449A F9                      	stc
 39012 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39013                                  ricb_exit:
 39014 0000449D C3                      	retn
 39015

 39017                                  
 39018                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39019                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39020                                  %if 0
 39021                                  
 39022                                  set_country_path:
 39023                                  
 39024                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39025                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39026                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39027                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39028                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39029                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39030                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39032                                  
 39033                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39034                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39035                                  
 39036                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39037                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39038                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39039                                  
 39040                                  	push	si
 39041                                  
 39042                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39043                                  	push	es
 39044                                  	pop	ds
 39045                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39046                                  
 39047                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39048                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39049                                  
 39050                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39051                                  	inc	si
 39052                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39053                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39054                                  
 39055                                  scp_default_drv:
 39056                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39057                                  	int	21h
 39058                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39059                                  
 39060                                  scp_setdrv:
 39061                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39062                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39063                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39064                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39065                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39066                                  
 39067                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39068                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39069                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39070                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39071                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39072                                  
 39073                                  scp_root_dir:
 39074                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39075                                  scp_path:
 39076                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39077                                  
 39078                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39079                                  scpath_exit:
 39080                                  
 39081                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39082                                  	push	es
 39083                                  	pop	ds
 39084                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39085                                  
 39086                                  	pop	si
 39087                                  	retn
 39088                                  
 39089                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39090                                  
 39091                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39092                                  
 39093                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39094                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39095                                  ;carry set if not.
 39096                                  
 39097                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39098                                  
 39099                                  	push	ax
 39100                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39101                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39102                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39103                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39104                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39105                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39106                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39107                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39108                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39109                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39110                                  
 39111                                  cdletter_no:
 39112                                  	stc
 39113                                  cdletter_exit:
 39114                                  	pop	ax
 39115                                  	retn
 39116                                  
 39117                                  %endif
 39118

 39123                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target

 39125                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 39126                                  
 39127                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39128                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 39129                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 39130

 39132                                  	; 10/09/2023

 39134 000044A1 A4                      	movsb

 39136                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 39137 000044A2 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023

 39815                                  
 39816                                  %if (number3mod>0) & (number3mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 39817 00004D6A 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number3mod) db 0
 39818                                  %endif
 39819                                  
 39820                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 39821                                  ; 09/12/2022 - MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS:3D20h ;;; SI_end = 3D20h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS 
 39822                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 39823                                  
 39824                                  ;MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:5899h

 39828                                  
 39829                                  ; 09/12/2022
 39830                                  ;
 39831                                  ;bss_start:
 39832                                  ;
 39833                                  ;ABSOLUTE bss_start
 39834                                  ;
 39835                                  ;alignb 16
 39836                                  
 39837                                  SI_end:  ; SI_end equ $
 39838

 39841                                  ;sysinitseg	ends
 39842

 39846                                  ; 09/12/2022 - MSDOS 5.0 SYSINIT:SI_end = SYSINIT:3D20h
